work.title: Kabyle NT
work.creator: ZefToOsis 1.0.0
work.subject: holy bible
work.coverage: provide the bible to the world

chapter.verse: Imi aṭas i gebdan tira ɣef wayen yedṛan gar-aneɣ,
akken i ɣ-t-id ɛawden wid yellan d inigan si tazwara, iwalan kullec s wallen-nsen ; uɣalen d iqeddacen n wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Steqsaɣ ula d nekk akken ilaq ɣef wayen akk yedṛan seg wass amezwaru, ufiɣ d ayen yelhan a k-t-id aruɣ a Tawfilus,
iwakken aț-țissineḍ tideț ɣef wayen i tesliḍ meṛṛa.
Di zzman n Hiṛudus, agellid n tmurt n Yahuda, yella yiwen n lmuqeddem si tejmaɛt n Abya, isem-is Zakarya. Tameṭṭut-is Ilicaba, seg izuṛan n Haṛun.
D iḥeqqiyen i llan i sin, ḥerzen yerna ḍuɛen awal n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ur sɛin ara dderya, meqqṛit i sin di leɛmeṛ yerna Ilicaba ț-țiɛiqeṛt.
Mi d-tewweḍ nnuba n leqdic n wedrum n Zakarya di lǧameɛ iqedsen
akken i tella di lɛadda n lmuqedmin, gren tasɣaṛt, tṣaḥ-ed Zakarya iwakken ad ikcem ɣer wemkan iqedsen ad isseṛɣ lebxuṛ.
Mi gella isseṛɣay lebxuṛ di lǧameɛ, lɣaci meṛṛa yeqqimen di beṛṛa deɛɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
Iḍheṛ-as-d yiwen lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi, ibedd ɣer tama tayeffust n udekkan-nni anda sseṛɣayen lebxuṛ.
Mi t-iwala Zakarya, yedhec ikcem-it lxuf.
Lmelk-nni yenna yas -ed : Ur țțagad ara a Zakarya, ayen i tessutreḍ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi yețwaqbel. Tameṭṭut-ik Ilicaba ad a k-d-tesɛu aqcic, a s-tsemmiḍ Yeḥya.
Aț-țfeṛḥeḍ yis, a k-yili d sebba n sseɛd ; imdanen meṛṛa ad feṛḥen s tlalit-is.
Ad yesɛu ccan d ameqqran ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi, a d-iččaṛ d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen si tɛebbuṭ n yemma-s, ur itess ccṛab, ur itess ayen nniḍen isekkṛen.
A d-yerr aṭas n wat Isṛail ɣer webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi.

Ad ilḥu s leɛnaya n Sidi Ṛebbi, s ṛṛuḥ ț-țezmert n nnbi Ilyas. Ad issemlil imawlan d warraw-nsen, a d-yerr wid ijehlen ɣer webrid n iḥeqqiyen, akken ad iheggi i Sidi Ṛebbi agdud ara t-iḍuɛen.
Zakarya yenna i lmelk : Amek ara ɛeqleɣ belli ayen akka i d-tenniḍ ț-țideț ? Nekk d amɣaṛ, ula ț-țameṭṭut-iw meqqṛet di leɛmeṛ !
Lmelk-nni yerra-yas-d : Nekk d Jebrayil, d aqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi ; usiɣ-ed s ɣuṛ-es iwakken a k-d-awiɣ lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ.

Lameɛna imi ur tumineḍ ara s yimeslayen-iw atan aț-țeggugmeḍ, ur d-ițeffeɣ ara wawal seg yimi-k alamma d asmi ara d-yedṛu wannect-agi. Meɛna ḥṣu belli ayen akka i k-d-nniɣ ad yedṛu deg wass-is.
Lɣaci-nni yețṛaǧun Zakarya deg ufrag, wehmen acuɣeṛ iɛeṭṭel deg umkan iqedsen n lǧameɛ.
Mi d-iffeɣ, yeggugem, ur izmir ara a d-yessufeɣ awal ; lɣaci-nni fehmen belli iweḥḥa-yas-ed kra Sidi Ṛebbi. Yebda ițwehhi-yasen-d s ifassen-is, yeqqim d agugam.
Mi kfan wussan n lxedma-s di lǧameɛ, Zakarya yuɣal ɣer wexxam-is.
Ɛeddan kra n wussan, tameṭṭut-is Ilicaba terfed tadist ; dɣa tesseḥjeb iman-is xemsa wagguren, teqqaṛ :
Atan Sidi Ṛebbi yerra-d ddehn-is ɣuṛ-i, ikkes-iyi lɛib zdat yemdanen.
Aggur wis sețța, Sidi Ṛebbi iceggeɛ-d lmelk Jebrayil ɣer taddart n Naṣaret, di tmurt n Jlili.
Iceggeɛ-it-id ɣer yiwet n tlemẓit i gexḍeb yiwen wergaz isem-is Yusef, yellan seg izuṛan n Sidna Dawed. Tilemẓit-agi isem-is Meryem.
Ikcem lmelk ɣuṛ-es yenna-yas : Sslam fell-am a tin iburek Sidi Ṛebbi ! Sidi Ṛebbi yella yid-em.
Meryem tedhec, tenna : D acu i d lmeɛna n imeslayen agi ?
Lmelk yenna-yas : Ur țțaggad ara a Meryem ! S ṛṛeḥma-s tameqqrant, Sidi Ṛebbi yextaṛ-ikem.
Atan aț-țrefdeḍ tadist, a d-tesɛuḍ aqcic, semmi-yas Ɛisa, (yeɛni : « Amsellek »)
Ad yesɛu ccan d ameqqran, ad ițțusemmi Mmi-s n Sidi Ṛebbi ɛlayen. Sidi Ṛebbi a t-yerr d agellid akken i t-yella Sidna Dawed, yiwen si lejdud-is.
Ad iḥkem ɣef tarwa n Yeɛqub i dayem, tageldit-is ur tfennu ara.
Meryem tenna i lmelk-nni : Amek ara d-idṛu yid-i wayagi nekk ur nezwiǧ ara ?
Lmelk yerra-yas : Atan a d-yers fell-am Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ; tazmert n Sidi Ṛebbi ɛlayen a kem-tɣumm am tili, daymi aqcic-agi imqeddes ara d-ilalen ad ițțsemmi « Mmi-s n Ṛebbi ».
Ilicaba i m-ițțilin, ula d nețțat ațan s tadist a d-tesɛu aqcic ɣas akken meqqṛet di leɛmeṛ. Tin akken iwumi semman tiɛiqeṛt, ațan deg waggur wis sețța,
imi ulac wayen iwumi ur izmir Sidi Ṛebbi.
Meryem tenna : Aql-i ț-țaqeddact n Sidi Ṛebbi, ad idṛu yid-i wayen i d-tenniḍ. Imiren Lmelk-nni yeǧǧa-ț, iṛuḥ.
Deg wussan-nni, Meryem tekker tṛuḥ s lemɣawla ɣer yiwet n taddart yellan deg idurar n tmurt n Yahuda.
Tekcem ɣer wexxam n Zakarya, tsellem ɣef Ilicaba.
Akken i tesla Ilicaba i sslam n Meryem, yefrawes llufan yellan di tɛebbuṭ-is ; imiren teččuṛ d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen,
tɛeggeḍ tenna : A Meryem, tețțubarkeḍ ger tilawin meṛṛa, ițțubarek daɣen win yellan di tɛebbuṭ-im.
D acu-yi, iwakken a d-terzef ɣuṛ-i yemma-s n Ssid-iw ?
Akken kan i sliɣ i sslam-im, llufan yellan di tɛebbuṭ-iw yefrawes s lfeṛḥ.
?-țaseɛdit kemm yumnen s wayen i m-d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi !
Meryem tenna : Taṛwiḥt-iw teḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi,
ul-iw yeččuṛ d lfeṛḥ imi d nețța i d amsellek-iw,
axaṭer iwala-yi-d nekk taqeddact-is tameɣbunt ur nesɛi azal. Sya d asawen si lǧil ɣer lǧil a yi-qqaṛen : « ț-țaseɛdit »,
imi Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n tezmert, yexdem yis-i ayen issewhamen. Isem-is d imqeddes.
Ṛṛeḥma-s tețdum si lǧil ɣer lǧil ɣef wid akk i t-iḍuɛen.
Isken-ed tazmert n yiɣil-is, isseɛṛeq iberdan i wid yețzuxxun ;
yessers-ed imeqqranen seg imukan eɛlayen, yerfed wid yețwaḥeqṛen ;
yesseṛwa-yasen leṛẓaq i wid yelluẓen, ma d imeṛkantiyen yerra-ten ifassen d ilmawen.
Isellek tarwa n wat Isṛail yellan d iqeddacen-is, ur ițțu ara Ṛṛeḥma-s,
i gewɛed i Sidna Ibṛahim d warraw-is i dayem akken i t-yenna i lejdud-nneɣ.
Meryem teqqim ɣer Ilicaba azal n tlata wagguren d wamek i tuɣal ɣer taddart-is.
Yewweḍ-ed lweqt i deg ara d-tarew Ilicaba, tesɛa-d aqcic.
Imawlan-is d lǧiran-is feṛḥen aṭas mi slan s ṛṛehma i d-issers fell-as Sidi Ṛebbi.
Mi wwḍen tmanya n wussan ɣef weqcic-nni, usan-d a s-sḍehṛen, bɣan a s-semmin s yisem n baba-s : Zakarya.
Dɣa tenṭeq-ed yemma-s tenna-yasen : Xaṭi ! A s-nsemmi Yeḥya !
Nnan-as : Ula d yiwen deg wedrum-nwen ur yesɛi isem-agi.
Steqsan baba-s s uwehhi amek yebɣa ad isemmi i mmi-s.
Issuter asen-d talwiḥt, yura-yasen-d deg-s : « Yeḥya i d isem-is ». Dɣa wehmen meṛṛa.
Imiren kan iserreḥ yiles-is, yebda iheddeṛ, yețḥemmid Ṛebbi ițcekkiṛ-it.
Imezdaɣ n lǧiha-nni meṛṛa wehmen, tɛeǧǧben. Deg idurar n tmurt n Yahuda țmeslayen akk ɣef wayen yedṛan.
Wid akk yeslan imeslayen-nni, ḥerzen-ten deg wulawen-nsen, qqaṛen : d acu ara d-iffeɣ weqcic-agi ? Axaṭer s tideț afus n Sidi Ṛebbi yella fell-as.
Zakarya, baba-s n weqcic-nni, iččuṛ d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, icar-ed s imeslayen-agi :
Ad ițțubarek Sidi Ṛebbi, Illu n wat Isṛail imi d-yerra ddehn-is ɣer wegdud-is iwakken a t-isellek.
Yefka-yaɣ-d yiwen wemsellek d ameqqran seg izuṛan n Sidna Dawed aqeddac-is,
am akken i t-id-ixebbeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi si zzman iɛeddan, seg yimi n lenbiya iqedsen :
Ad yili d amsellek ara ɣ-imenɛen seg yiɛdawen-nneɣ, si ger ifassen n wid akk i ɣ-ikeṛhen.
Isbeggen ṛṛeḥma-s i lejdud-nneɣ, yemmekta-d lemɛahda-s iqedsen
i gefka i jeddi-tneɣ Sidna Ibṛahim.
M'ara nețțusellek seg ufus n yeɛdawen-nneɣ, a neɛbed Sidi Ṛebbi mbla lxuf,
s lḥeqq, s ṭṭaɛa d wannuz deg wussan n ddunit-nneɣ meṛṛa.
Ma d kečč a mmi, aț-țețțusemmiḍ d nnbi n Sidi Ṛebbi eɛlayen axaṭer aț-țedduḍ zdat-es iwakken aț-țheggiḍ iberdan-is,
aț-țesfehmeḍ agdud-is ɣef leslak n Sidi Ṛebbi s leɛfu n ddnubat-nsen.
Axaṭer Ṛebbi-nneɣ d aḥnin, s Ṛṛeḥma-ines a d-icṛeq fell-aɣ tafat-is am tin n yiṭij seg yigenwan.
Tafat-is a d-tecṛeq ɣef wid yellan di ṭṭlam n lmut, ad aɣ-yawi deg webrid n lehna.
Aqcic-nni ițțimɣuṛ yețnerni di leɛqel. Iɛac deg unezṛuf armi d ass i deg i d-ibeggen iman-is i wat Isṛail.
Deg ussan-nni, yeffeɣ-ed yiwen n lqanun s ɣuṛ Qayṣeṛ ameqqran ; yefka lameṛ ad țțujerrden imezdaɣ meṛṛa yellan di tmura-ines.
Ajerred-agi amezwaru yedṛa asmi yella Kirinyus d lḥakem n tmurt n Surya.
Imdanen meṛṛa ṛuḥen ad țțujerden mkul yiwen di taddart n lejdud-is.
Yusef yellan seg izuṛan n Sidna Dawed, yuli ula d nețța si taddart n Naṣaret n tmurt n Jlili ɣer Bitelḥem, taddart n lejdud-is yellan di tmurt n Yahuda.
Iṛuḥ ad ițțujerred nețța ț-țxedibt-is Meryem yellan s tadist.
Mi ten-yuɣ lḥal dinna, yewweḍ-d lweqt i deg ara terbu ( tarew ) Meryem.
Tesɛa-d mmi-s amenzu, tețțel-it, tessegen-it di lmedwed, imi ur ufin ara amkan deg wexxam n yemsafren.
Di tmurt-nni, llan imeksawen ițnusun di lexlawi, țɛassan lmal-nsen deg yiḍ.
Ataya lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi iḍheṛ-asen-d, tamanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi tecceɛceɛ tezzi-yasen-d, ikcem-iten lxuf d ameqqran.
Lmelk yenna-yasen : Ur țțagadet ! Aql-i wwiɣ-awen-d lexbaṛ lxiṛ ara isfeṛḥen wugdud meṛṛa.
Ass-agi di taddart n Sidna Dawed, ilul-awen-d yiwen wemsellek, d nețța i d Lmasiḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi !
Atan wamek ara t-tɛeqlem : aț-țafem llufan yețțel, yeṭṭes di lmedwed.
Imiren kan, ț-țirebbaɛ n lmalayekkat i d-yernan ɣer lmelk nni, cennunt țḥemmident Sidi Ṛebbi, qqaṛent :
Lḥemd i Sidi Ṛebbi deg imukan eɛlayen, lehna di ddunit ɣef yemdanen eɛzizen fell-as.
Akken uɣalent lmalayekkat-nni ɣer yigenni, imeksawen nnan wway gar-asen : Kkret a nṛuḥet ɣer Bitelḥem, a nẓer ayen i gedṛan, d wayen akka s wayes i ɣ-d-ixebbeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi.
Imiren kan ṛuḥen, ufan dinna Meryem d Yusef akk-d llufan-nni yeṭṭes di lmedwed.
Mi walan aqcic-nni, ḥkan-d wayen i sen-d-yenna lmelk fell-as.
Wid akk yeslan s wayen i d-ḥkan imeksawen-nni, dehcen.
Meryem teḥrez imeslayen-nni deg wul-is, tețxemmim fell-asen.
Mi uɣalen imeksawen-nni, țḥemmiden țcekkiṛen Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wayen slan d wayen ẓran, imi ufan kullec akken i sen-d-ițțuxebbeṛ.
Yewweḍ-ed wass wis tmanya i deg ara s-sḍehṛen i weqcic-nni ; semman-as Ɛisa, isem-nni i s-yefka lmelk uqbel ad yili di tɛebbuṭ n yemma-s.
Asmi wwḍen ṛebɛin wussan ɣef tlalit n weqcic-nni, Yusef d Meryem wwin-t ɣer temdint n Lquds iwakken ad ițțuqeddem i Sidi Ṛebbi,
akken yura di ccariɛa n Sidna Musa : yal aqcic amenzu, ilaq ad ițțuqeddem i Sidi Ṛebbi.
Yerna ṛuḥen iwakken ad fken d asfel snat n tmilliwin neɣ sin yetbiren imeẓyanen akken yella di ccariɛa n Sidna Musa.
Di temdint n Lquds yella yiwen wergaz isem-is Semɛun. Argaz-agi d aḥeqqi, iḍuɛ Sidi Ṛebbi, yețṛaǧu amsellek n wat Isṛail, Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yețțili yid-es.
Iweḥḥa-yas-ed belli ur ițmețțat ara alamma yeẓra Lmasiḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi iwelleh Semɛun ad iṛuḥ ɣer lǧameɛ iqedsen.Atnaya kecmen-d Yusef d Meryem, wwin-d llufan-nni iwakken ad xedmen wayen i d-tenna ccariɛa n Musa fell-as.
Semɛun yeṭṭef aqcic-nni ger ifassen-is, iḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi yenna :
Tura a Sidi Ṛebbi ɣas ad mmteɣ aql-i di lehna imi amsellek i ɣ-tweɛdeḍ,
yewweḍ-ed yerna walaɣ-t s wallen-iw :
win akken i theggaḍ i leǧnas meṛṛa,
d nețța ara yessalin ccan n wat Isṛail agdud-ik, ara yilin ț-țafat ara d-icceɛceɛen ula ɣef leǧnas nniḍen.
Baba-s d yemma-s n weqcic-nni tɛeǧǧben ɣef wayen i d-qqaṛen fell-as.

Semɛun iburek-iten, yenna i Meryem, yemma-s n weqcic-nni : Atan weqcic-agi ad yili i kra seg wat Isṛail d sebba n tuccḍa, ma d wiyaḍ a ten-id-yerr ɣer webrid. ?ef ddemma-s ara yili lxilaf ger yemdanen ;
s wakka ara d-banen ixemmimen n diri deg wulawen, ma d kemm aț-țejreḥ tasa-m, am akken tețwet s ujenwi.
Tella daɣen yiwet n tmeṭṭut isem-is ?anna, meqqṛet di leɛmeṛ, ula d nețțat si lenbiya, d yelli-s n Fanwil n wedrum n Azir. Seg wasmi i tedda ț-țislit, tɛac d wergaz is sebɛa n yiseggasen
dɣa teǧǧel. Di leɛmeṛ-is ṛebɛa utmanyin n yiseggasen. Am yiḍ am ass ur teṭṭixiṛ si lǧameɛ iqedsen, tɛebbed Sidi Ṛebbi, tețțuẓum, tețẓalla.
Ula d nețțat tewweḍ-ed di teswiɛt-nni, teḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi, theddeṛ ɣef weqcic-nni i wid akk yețṛaǧun leslak n temdint n Lquds.
Mi fukken imawlan n Ɛisa ayen akk i d-tenna ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi, uɣalen ɣer taddart-nsen Naṣaret yellan di tmurt n Jlili.
Aqcic-nni yețțimɣuṛ yețnerni di tmusni, lbaṛaka n Sidi Ṛebbi tella fell-as.
Imawlan n Sidna Ɛisa țṛuḥun mkul aseggas ɣer temdint n Lquds iwakken ad sɛeddin Tafaska n izimer n leslak.
Asmi yesɛa Ɛisa tnac yiseggasen, yedda akk-d imawlan-is ɣer temdint n Lquds, akken tella di lɛadda n lɛid.
Mi tɛedda Tafaska, lɣaci țțuɣalen ɣer yexxamen-nsen, ma d Ɛisa yeqqim di temdint Lquds, imawlan-is ur d-wwin ara s lexbaṛ,
ɣilen yedda-d ț-țerbaɛt nniḍen. Lḥan ass kamel dɣa bdan țqelliben fell-as. Steqsan wid akk i sen-yețțilin d wid meṛṛa ssnen,
lameɛna ur t-ufin ara. Uɣalen ɣer temdint n Lquds iwakken ad qellben fell-as.
Ass wis tlata, ufan-t di lǧameɛ iqedsen yeqqim ger lecyux, ismeḥsis asen, isteqsay-iten.
Wid akk i s isellen wehmen di lefhama-s d wayen i d-ițarra i yesteqsiyen-nsen.
Mi t-walan imawlan-is, qqimen wehmen, dɣa tenna-yas yemma-s : A mmi, acuɣeṛ i ɣ-txedmeḍ akka ? Nekk d baba-k neṛwa aḥebbeṛ, acḥal i nqelleb fell-ak !
Nețța yenna-yasen : Acuɣeṛ i tețqellibem fell-i ? Eɛni ur teẓrim ara ilaq-iyi ad xedmeɣ lecɣal n baba ?
Lameɛna nutni ur fhimen ara ayen i sen-d-yenna.
Ɛisa yedda d imawlan-is ɣer temdint n Naṣaret, yețțaɣ-asen awal. Yemma-s teḥrez annect-agi meṛṛa deg wul-is.
Ɛisa ițțimɣuṛ, yetɛeqqil ; eɛziz ɣer Ṛebbi, eɛziz ɣer yemdanen.

Deg wuseggas wis xemseṭṭac n tgeldit n Qayṣer Tibeṛyus, llan ṛebɛa lḥekkam di tmurt n Falisṭin. Bunṭus Bilaṭus d lḥakem n tmurt n Yahuda, Hiṛudus Antifas yeḥkem ɣef tmurt n Jlili, Filbas gma-s n Hiṛudus, ɣef tmura n Iturya akk-d Tṛaxunit, ma d Lisanyas yeḥkem ɣef tmurt n Abilan.
Di lweqt-nni, ?ennan akk-d Qayif llan d lmuqedmin imeqqranen. Awal n Sidi Ṛebbi ițwaxebbeṛ-as-ed i Yeḥya, mmi-s n Zakarya, deg unezṛuf.
Iṛuḥ ițnadi timura i d-izzin i wasif n Urdun, yețberriḥ yeqqaṛ : Beddlet tikli, uɣalet-ed ɣer webrid, aset-ed aț-țețwaɣeḍsem iwakken Sidi Ṛebbi a wen-isemmeḥ ddnubat-nwen !
Akken i d-ițțuxebeṛ di tektabt n nnbi Iceɛya : ?-țaɣect n win ițɛeggiḍen deg wunezṛuf : Heggit abrid n Sidi Ṛebbi, ssemsawit iberdan-is !
Iɣezṛan, idurar ț-țɣaltin ad uɣalen d izuɣaṛ ! Iberdan iɛewjen ad țțuseggmen, wid ixesṛen ad qeɛden .
Imdanen meṛṛa ad ẓren leslak n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Yeḥya yeqqaṛ i lɣaci i d-ițțasen iwakken ad țwaɣeḍsen deg waman : A ccetla n yizerman, anwa i kkun-isfaqen belli tzemrem aț- țrewlem i lɛiqab i d-iteddun ?

Deg wayen akk txeddmem, sbeggnet-ed belli ṣfan wulawen nwen ! Ur qqaṛet ara kan deg yiman-nwen : jeddi-tneɣ d Sidna Ibṛahim, axaṭer a wen-iniɣ : seg idɣaɣen-agi, Sidi Ṛebbi yezmer a d-issufeɣ dderya i Ibṛahim.
Ațan ihi tcaquṛt thegga ɣer izuṛan n ttjuṛ, yal ttejṛa ur d-nețțak ara lfakya lɛali, aț-țețwagzem, aț-țețwaḍeggeṛ ɣer tmes.
Lɣaci steqsan-t nnan-as : D acu i ɣ-ilaqen a t-nexdem ihi ?
Yerra-yasen : Win yesɛan sin iqendyaṛ ad yefk yiwen i win ur nesɛi ara ; win yesɛan ayen ara yečč, ad yefk i win ur nesɛi ara.
Usan-d ula d imekkasen itețțen ayla n medden iwakken ad țwaɣeḍsen deg wasif, nnan-as : A Sidi, i nukkni yellan d imekkasen n tebzert ( leɣṛama ) d acu ara nexdem ?
Yenna-yasen : Ur țnadit ara sennig wayen i d-yenna lqanun.
Iɛeskṛiwen daɣen steqsan-t : I nukkni, d acu ara nexdem ? Yerra-yasen : Ur xeddmet ara lbaṭel, ur țțaṭṭafet ara tajɛelt, setqenɛet kan s lexlaṣ nwen.
Yuɣ lḥal lɣaci meṛṛa llan țṛaǧun qqaṛen deg ulawen-nsen : Ahat d nețța i d Lmasiḥ !

Yeḥya yenna-yasen : Nekk sseɣḍaseɣ-kkun deg waman, meɛna a d-yas win yesɛan tazmert akteṛ-iw ; ur uklaleɣ ara ad fsiɣ ula d lexyuḍ n warkasen-is. Nețța a kkun-isseɣḍes s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ț-țmes.
Yeṭṭef tazzart deg wufus-is, ad yessizdeg tirect deg wennar-is, a d-ijmeɛ irden ɣer yikufan, ma d alim a t-isseṛɣ di tmes ur nxețți.
Yeḥya ițbecciṛ i lɣaci lexbaṛ n lxiṛ, inehhu-ten s waṭas n yimeslayen nniḍen.
Yesseḍlem ula d agellid Hiṛudus, yeqqaṛ-as : mačči d lḥeqq fell-ak aț-țaɣeḍ Hiṛudyad tameṭṭut n gma-k ! Ilumm-it daɣen ɣef lecɣal nniḍen n diri i gxeddem.
Hiṛudus ikemmel di txeṣṣarin-is, yessekcem Yeḥya ɣer lḥebs !
Mi țwaɣeḍsen lɣaci deg waman, Sidna Ɛisa yețwaɣḍes ula d nețța. Akken i gdeɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi, igenni yeldi-d,
Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yers-ed fell-as s ṣṣifa icuban titbirt. Yiwet n taɣect tekka-d seg yigenni tenna-d : Kečč, d mmi eɛzizen, deg-k i gella lfeṛḥ-iw.
Mi gebda Sidna Ɛisa aselmed, ad yili yesɛa tlatin iseggasen di leɛmeṛ-is. ?er yemdanen yella : d mmi-s n Yusef atnan lejdud-is : Heli,
Matta, Lewwi, Melki, Yennay, Yusef,
Matatya, Ɛamus, Naḥun, ?esli, Naggay,
Maḥat, Matatya, Camɛi, Yusef, Yuda,
Yuḥanan, Rica, Zurubabil, Calatyel, Niri,
Melki, Addi, Qusam, Elmudan, Ɛir,
Yusa, Elyazer, Yurim, Matta, Lewwi,
Semɛun, Yahuda, Yusef, Yuna, Elyaqim,
Melya, Menna, Mattata, Natan, Dawed,
Yassa, Ɛubed, Buɛaz, Salmun, Naḥsun,
Ɛaminadab, Admin, Aram, ?esṛun, Fares, Yahuda,
Yeɛqub, Isḥaq, Ibṛahim, Teraḥ, Naḥur,
Saruǧ, Raɛu, Faleǧ, Ɛaber, Salaḥ,
Kenan, Arfaksad, Cam, Nuḥ, Lamek,
Matusalaḥ, ?anux, Yared, Mahalalyel, Kenam,
Inuc, Cit, Adem illan d mmi-s n Ṛebbi.
Mi d- yuɣal Sidna Ɛisa seg wasif n Urdun, Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yewwi-t ɣer unezṛuf.
Ṛebɛin wussan ur yečči, Cciṭan yețjeṛṛib deg-s. Mi ɛeddan wussan-nni, yuɣal illuẓ.
Cciṭan yenna-yas : Ma d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi i telliḍ, ini-yas i wedɣaɣ-agi a d-yuɣal d aɣṛum.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yura di tektabt iqedsen : amdan ur yețɛic ara s weɣṛum kan meɛna s mkul awal i d-ițțasen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi.
Yuɣal Cciṭan yewwi-t ɣer yiwen wemkan eɛlayen, deg yiwet n teswiɛt yesken-as-ed akk tigeldiwin n ddunit,
yenna-yas : Ad a k-d-fkeɣ lḥekma d ccan n ddewlat-agi meṛṛa, axaṭer țțunefkent iyi-d. Zemreɣ a tent-fkeɣ i win i yi-ihwan ;
ma tseǧǧdeḍ zdat-i ad uɣalent akk d ayla-k.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yura : Anagar Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-inek ara tɛebdeḍ, i nețța kan iwumi ara tseǧǧdeḍ.
Cciṭan yewwi-t daɣen ɣer temdint n Lquds, yessers-it ɣef yixef n lǧameɛ iqedsen, yenna-yas : Ma d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi i telliḍ, ḍeggeṛ iman-ik d akessar,
axaṭer yura : Ad yefk lameṛ i lmalayekkat-is iwakken ad ḥarbent fell-ak,
yerna a k-awint ger ifassen-nsent, ad ḥadrent iḍaṛṛen-ik ɣef wedɣaɣ.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yura daɣen : Ur țjeṛṛib ara Sidi Ṛebbi, Illu-inek.
Mi i t-ijeṛṛeb s waṭas n tḥila ur s-yufi ara abrid, Iblis yeṭṭaxeṛ fell-as alamma ț-țikkelt nniḍen.
Sidna Ɛisa yuɣal ɣer tmurt n Jlili yeččuṛ ț-țazmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, slan yis di mkul tama n tmurt-agi.
Ikeččem ɣer leǧwameɛ n wat Isṛail yesselmad, imdanen meṛṛa țcekkiṛen-t.
Iṛuḥ ɣer taddart n Naṣaret anda yețțuṛebba ; akken innum, ikcem ɣer lǧameɛ deg wass n westeɛfu.
Mi gekker a d-iɣeṛ, fkan-as-d taktabt n nnbi Iceɛya, yeldi-ț, yufa amkan anda yura :

Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi yers-ed fell-i, axaṭer yextaṛ-iyi iwakken ad beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i yimeɣban, ad beccṛeɣ i yimeḥbas tilelli, iwakken a d-rreɣ iẓri i yiderɣalen , a d kkseɣ lḥif ɣef wid ițwaḍelmen,
ad beccṛeɣ ɣef wuseggas i deg ara d-issers Sidi Ṛebbi ṛṛeḥma ines .
Ijmeɛ taktabt-nni, yerra-ț i uqeddac, imiren yeqqim. Wid akk yellan di lǧameɛ ččan-t s wallen.
Dɣa yenna-yasen : Ayen i wen-d-ɣṛiɣ akka, atan yedṛa-d gar-awen ass-agi !
Wehmen atas, tɛeǧǧben deg yimeslayen i d-ițeffɣen seg yimi-s, qqaṛen : Amek ? Mačči d mmi-s n Yusef wagi ?
Dɣa yenna-yasen : ?riɣ belli a yi-d-tinim lemtel-agi : « A ṭṭbib sseḥlu iman-ik,» neɣ « xdem dagi di tmurt-ik ayen i nesla txedmeḍ-t di temdint n Kafernaḥum.»
Yenna-yasen daɣen : S tideț a wen-iniɣ : ulac nnbi yețwaqeblen di tmurt-is.
A wen-iniɣ tideț : Di zzman n nnbi Ilyas, tlata yiseggasen d wezgen ur d-tewwit lehwa dɣa yeɣli-d laẓ d ameqqran ɣef tmurt meṛṛa. Deg wussan-nni, aṭas n tuǧǧal i gellan di tmurt n wat Isṛail.
?as akken, Sidi Ṛebbi ur iceggeɛ ara nnbi Ilyas ɣer yiwet deg-sent, anagar ɣ er yiwet n taǧǧalt yellan di taddart n ?urfat di tmurt n Sidun .
Llan daɣen aṭas n wid ihelken lbeṛs di tmurt n wat Isṛail di zzman n nnbi Ilyaceɛ , meɛna ula d yiwen deg-sen ur iḥli anagar Neɛman n tmurt n Surya.
Mi slan imeslayen-agi, lɣaci meṛṛa yellan di lǧameɛ yenɣa-ten lɣecc.
Kkren ɣuṛ-es, ssufɣen-t si taddart, ssawḍen-t armi d ixef n wedrar i ɣef tebna taddart-nsen iwakken a t-ssegrirben d akessar ;
lameɛna nețța iɛedda gar-asen, iṛuḥ.
Sidna Ɛisa iṣubb ɣer tamdint n Kafernaḥum, illan n at Jlili, anda yesselmad lɣaci deg wass n westeɛfu.
Imdanen wehmen aṭas deg wuselmed-ines axaṭer imeslayen-is sɛan tissas.
Di lǧameɛ, yella yiwen wergaz izdeɣ-it uṛuḥani, iɛeggeḍ s lǧehd n taɣect-is :
D acu i tebɣiḍ ɣuṛ-nneɣ a Ɛisa Anaṣari ? Tusiḍ-ed iwakken ad aɣ tesnegreḍ ? ?riɣ d acu-k , kečč d Imqeddes n Ṛebbi !
Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq ɣuṛ-es yenna-yas : Ssusem ! Effeɣ seg wergaz-agi ! Aṛuḥani iḍeggeṛ argaz-nni ɣer lqaɛa di tlemmast-nsen, dɣa iffeɣ seg-s mbla ma iḍuṛṛ-it.
Lɣaci ikcem-iten akk lxuf, qqaṛen wway gar-asen : D acu-ten yimeslayen-agi ? Yesɛa tazmert s wayes iḥekkem ula ɣef leǧnun ! Akken kan ara sen-yefk lameṛ ad ffɣen !
Di yal tama n tmurt slan s lexbaṛ n Sidna Ɛisa.
Iffeɣ-ed si lǧameɛ, yerra ɣer wexxam n Semɛun. Yuɣ lḥal taḍeggalt n Semɛun tuɣ-iț tawla ț-țameqqrant, ḥellelen Sidna Ɛisa iwakken a ț-yesseḥlu.
Yekna ɣuṛ-es, yumeṛ i tawla aț-țeffeɣ seg-s, dɣa teffeɣ-iț ; imiren kan tekker teqdec-asen-d.
Tameddit mi geɣli yiṭij, kra n win yesɛan amuḍin n mkul aṭan, yewwi-yas-t-id. Mkul win i ɣef yessers afus-is yeḥla ! Yesseḥla-ten meṛṛa !

Llan daɣen leǧnun i d-ițeffɣen seg waṭas n yemdanen, țɛeggiḍen qqaṛen : « Kečč d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi ! » Lameɛna Sidna Ɛisa ițɛeggiḍ fell- asen, ur ten-ițțaga ara a d-hedṛen, axaṭer nutni ẓran d nețța i d Lmasiḥ.
Mi guli wass, iffeɣ si temdint, yerra ɣer yiwen wemkan yexlan. Aṭas n lɣaci ṛuḥen țqelliben fell-as. Mi t-ufan, ḥellelen-t iwakken ad yeqqim ɣuṛ-sen, ur ițṛuḥu ara.
Lameɛna nețța yenna-yasen : Ilaq-iyi ad ṛuḥeɣ ad beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n tgeldit n Ṛebbi i temdinin nniḍen ! ?ef wayagi i d țțuceggɛeɣ !
Imiren iṛuḥ ițbecciṛ di leǧwameɛ n tmurt n Yahuda.
Yiwen wass, Sidna Ɛisa yella ɣef rrif n lebḥeṛ n Jiniṣaret. Lɣaci meṛṛa zzin-as-d, mčuččaɛen-d akken ad slen i wawal n Ṛebbi.
Iwala snat n teflukin rrif n lebḥeṛ, iḥewwaten rsen-d iwakken ad ssirden icebbaken nsen.
Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer yiwet si teflukin-nni, tin yellan n Semɛun, yenna-yas ad ibɛed acemma ɣef rrif. Yeqqim , yebda yesselmad-ed lɣaci syenna.
Mi gfukk aselmed yenna i Semɛun : Sbeɛdet taflukt ɣer wemkan lqayen, tḍeggṛem icebbaken-nwen aț-țṣeggdem.
Semɛun yenna-yas : A Sidi, iḍ kamel nukni d aṣeggeḍ ur d-neṭṭif acemma ; lameɛna ɣef wawal-ik a nexdem akken i d-tenniḍ, a nḍeggeṛ icebbaken.
Mi xedmen akken i sen-yenna Sidna Ɛisa, ṭṭfen-d aṭas n iselman ( lḥut ), armi qṛib ad qeṛsen icebbaken nsen.
Ssawalen, țwehhin i yemdukkal nsen yellan di teflukt nniḍen a d-asen a ten-ɛiwnen. Mi d-usan, ččuṛen snat-nni n teflukin armi qṛib ad ɣeṛqent.
Semɛun-Buṭrus, mi gwala ayagi, yuɣal ɣef tgecrar zdat Sidna Ɛisa, yenna-yas : Beɛɛed fell-i a Sidi axaṭer d amednub i lliɣ.
Ikcem-it lxuf nețța d wid yellan yid-es, dehcen imi i d-ṭṭfen annect-nni n yiselman.

Ula d Yeɛqub akk-d Yuḥenna, arraw n Zabadi yellan d imdukkal n Semɛun wehmen. Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq ɣer Semɛun yenna-yas : Ur țțagad ara, sya d asawen mačči d iselman ara d-țṣeggideḍ, meɛna d imdanen.
Imiren rran-d tiflukin-nsen ɣer rrif, ǧǧan kullec dinna, ddan d Sidna Ɛisa.

Mi gella Sidna Ɛisa deg yiwet n taddart n at Jlili, yusa-d yiwen wergaz ihelken lbeṛs, mi gwala Sidna Ɛisa, yuzzel ɣuṛ-es yeɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen-is, yenna-yas : A Sidi, ma tebɣiḍ, tzemreḍ a yi-tesseḥluḍ.
Sidna Ɛisa issers afus-is fell-as, yenna-yas : Bɣiɣ ! Ili-k teḥliḍ ! Imiren kan, argaz-nni ikkes-as lbeṛs, yeṣfa weglim-is.

Sidna Ɛisa iweṣṣa-t ur iqqaṛ i yiwen ayen yedṛan yid-es. Yenna-yas : Ṛuḥ ɣer lmuqeddem a k-iwali, tefkeḍ lweɛda ɣef ṣeffu-inek, akken yura di ccariɛa n Musa. Lweɛda-nni a sen-tili d țbut ɣef ḥellu-inek.
Simmal ițwassen Sidna Ɛisa, simmal țnejmaɛen-d ɣuṛ-es lɣaci iwakken ad slen i wawal-is yerna a ten-isseḥlu si lehlakat-nsen ;
meɛna nețța iṭeṛṛif iman-is, ițṛuḥu ɣer yimukan yexlan iwakken ad iẓẓall.

Yiwen wass Sidna Ɛisa yella yesselmad. Llan dinna ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa, usan-d si tuddar n at Jlili, n at Yahuda akk ț-țemdint n Lquds, qqimen smeḥsisen-as. Tazmert n Sidi Ṛebbi yellan yid-es tesseḥlay imuḍan.
Atnaya kra n yemdanen wwin-d yiwen wukrif akken deg wusu-ines. ?qelliben amek ara t-skecmen iwakken a t-ssersen zdat Sidna Ɛisa.
Imi aṭas n lɣaci i gellan, ur ufin ara ansi ara t-sɛeddin ; ulin ɣef ssqef, kksen kra n iqermuden, ṣubben-t-id s wusu-ines ɣer tlemmast n lɣaci, zdat Sidna Ɛisa.
Mi gwala liman-nsen, yenna i umuḍin-nni : Ay argaz, țwaɛeffan-ak ddnubat ik !
Lɛulama akk-d ifariziyen bdan țxemmimen qqaṛen : Amek yezmer a d-yini imeslayen agi ? Wagi d lekfeṛ ! Anwa i gzemren ad iɛfu ddnubat anagar Sidi Ṛebbi ?
Sidna Ɛisa yeẓran ayen i țxemmimen, yenna-yasen : Acuɣeṛ tețxemmimem akka deg ulawen-nwen ?
D acu i gsehlen a s-t-iniɣ ? « ?waɛeffan-ak ddnubat-ik» neɣ « ekker telḥuḍ ? »
Ilaq-awen aț-țeẓrem belli Mmi-s n bunadem yesɛa tazmert ad yeɛfu ddnubat di ddunit-agi ! Yezzi ɣer wukrif-nni, yenna-yas : Kker ddem usu-inek tuɣaleḍ ɣer wexxam-ik !
Imiren kan ukrif-nni yekker zdat-sen, yeddem usu i deg yeḍleq, yuɣal ɣer wexxam-is, ițḥemmid Sidi Ṛebbi.
Wehmen meṛṛa lɣaci, țḥemmiden Sidi Ṛebbi, ikcem-iten lxuf qqaṛen : Ass-agi neẓra ayen werǧin neẓri !
Mi geffeɣ Sidna Ɛisa, iwala yiwen umekkas isem-is Lewwi yeqqim di texxamt anda țxelliṣen tabzert ( leɣṛama ), iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-es yenna-yas : Ddu yid-i.
Lewwi yekker, yeǧǧa kullec yedda yid-es.
Lewwi yeɛṛeḍ Sidna Ɛisa ɣer wexxam-is, ihegga-yas imensi. Aṭas n yimekkasen d yemdanen nniḍen i geqqimen yid-sen ad ččen.
Ifariziyen d lɛulama n ukabar-nsen iɣaḍ-iten lḥal, nnan i yinelmaden is : Acuɣeṛ i tețțem, tessem akk-d imekkasen imakaren d imednuben ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Mačči d wid iṣeḥḥan i geḥwaǧen ṭṭbib, i t-iḥwaǧen d imuḍan.
Ur d-usiɣ ara ad ssiwleɣ i iḥeqqiyen, usiɣ-ed ɣer yimednuben iwakken a d-uɣalen ɣer webrid.
Nnan-as daɣen : Inelmaden n Yeḥya d wid n ifariziyen țțuẓummen acḥal d abrid yerna țẓallan, ma d inelmaden-ik tețțen tessen.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna yasen : Eɛni tzemrem a sen-tinim i yinebgawen n yesli ad uẓummen ass n tmeɣṛa ? Ur tezmirem ara !
Ad asen wussan i deg ara sen-ițwakkes yesli, ass-nni ad uẓummen.

Yerna-yasen-d lemtel-agi : Yiwen ur d-itekkes tafaweț si llebsa tajdiṭ iwakken a ț-ixiḍ ɣef llebsa taqdimt , neɣ m'ulac llebsa-nni tajdiṭ aț-țcerreg ; tafaweț-nni tajdiṭ ur d-țezgay ara ɣef llebsa-nni taqdimt.
Daɣen yiwen ur ismaray ccṛab ajdid ɣer yiyeddiden iqdimen , neɣ m'ulac ccṛab-nni ajdid ad icerreg iyeddiden nni ; ur d-ițɣimi ccṛab ur d-țɣimin iyeddiden.
Ihi ccṛab ajdid, ilaq a t-nesmir ɣer iyeddiden ijdiden.
Akken daɣen win yennumen d ccṛab aqdim ur issutur ara ajdid axaṭer yeqqaṛ « d aqdim i gelhan. »
Yiwen wass, Sidna Ɛisa akk-d inelmaden-is zegren igran n yirden deg wass n westeɛfu. Tekksen d tigedrin, țḥukkun-tent ger ifassen nsen, tețțen-tent.
Kra n ifariziyen nnan-asen : Acuɣeṛ i txeddmem ayen ur neḥlil deg wass n westeɛfu ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Ur teɣṛim ara ayen yexdem ugellid Dawed asmi yelluẓ nețța d imdukkal-is,
d wamek i gekcem ɣer wexxam iqedsen anda keččmen anagar lmuqedmin ! Iddem-ed aɣṛum n lweɛda, yečča yerna yefka i wid yellan yid-es ɣas akken aɣṛum-nni i lmuqedmin kan iwumi yeḥlel !
Sidna Ɛisa yerna-yasen-d : Mmi-s n bunadem, d nețța i gḥekkmen ɣef wass n westeɛfu !
Ass n westeɛfu nniḍen, Sidna Ɛisa yekcem ɣer lǧameɛ, yebda yesselmad. Yella dinna yiwen wergaz iwumi yekref ufus ayeffus.
Lɛulama n ccariɛa d ifariziyen țɛassan Sidna Ɛisa, ad ẓren ma ad isseḥlu deg wass n westeɛfu iwakken a s-d-afen sebba s wacu ara ccetkin fell-as.
Lameɛna Sidna Ɛisa yessnen ixemmimen-nsen, yekker yenna i wergaz-nni iwumi yekref ufus : Ekker tbeddeḍ dagi di tlemmast n lɣaci. Argaz-nni yekker ibedd.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna : A kkun-steqsiɣ : d acu yellan d leḥlal deg wass n westeɛfu, a nexdem lxiṛ neɣ a nexdem cceṛ ? A nsellek amdan neɣ a t-neǧǧ ad immet ?
Yerfed allen-is ɣer wid akk i s-d-yezzin , dɣa yenna i wergaz nni : Eḍleq afus-ik ! Ukrif-nni yeḍleq afus-is, yeḥla.
Nutni yenɣa-ten lɣecc, bdan țemcawaṛen wway gar-asen amek ara xedmen i Sidna Ɛisa.
Deg ussan-nni, Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer wedrar akken ad iẓẓall. Yeqqim iḍ kamel nețța ideɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
Mi yuli wass, yessawel i yinelmaden is, yextaṛ seg-sen tnac iwumi isemma « ṛṛusul» yeɛni « imceggɛen.»
Yella Semɛun iwumi isemma Buṭrus akk-d gma-s Andriyus, Yeɛqub, Yuḥenna, Filbas, Bartelmay,
Matta, ?uma, Yeɛqub mmi-s n ?alfi, Semɛun iwumi qqaṛen awaṭani,
Yahuda mmi-s n Yeɛqub d Yudas n taddart n Qeṛyut win yuɣalen d axeddaɛ.

Sidna Ɛisa iṣubb-ed yid-sen seg wedrar, ḥebsen di luḍa anda nnejmaɛen aṭas n yinelmaden-is d waṭas n lɣaci i d-yusan si tmurt n Yahuda, si temdint n Lquds, si temdinin n ?ur akk-d Sidun yellan rrif n lebḥeṛ.
Usan-d iwakken ad slen i wawal-is yerna a ten-isseḥlu si lehlakat-nsen ; wid akk zedɣen leǧnun, ḥlan.
Lɣaci meṛṛa țqelliben a t-nalen ( a t-massen ) axaṭer tețțeffeɣ-ed seg-s tezmert i ten-isseḥlayen akk.
Sidna Ɛisa yerfed allen-is ɣer inelmaden-is yenna : Amarezg-nwen kunwi yellan d iẓawaliyen, tagelda n Sidi Ṛebbi d ayla-nwen.
Amarezg-nwen kunwi yelluẓen tura, a d-yas wass i deg ara teṛwum. Amarezg-nwen kunwi yețrun tura, a d-yas wass i deg ara tilim di lfeṛḥ.
D iseɛdiyen ara tilim m'ara kkun-keṛhen yemdanen, m'ara kkun-qecɛen, m'ara kkun-regmen, ad rren isem-nwen amzun d lɛaṛ ɣef ddemma n Mmi-s n bunadem.
Ass-nni ilit di lfeṛḥ, friwset s lfeṛḥ axaṭer d ṛṛezq ameqqran i kkun-ițṛaǧun deg igenni ! Imi akka i xedmen lejdud-nsen i lenbiya.
Ma d kunwi ay imeṛkantiyen, a tawaɣit-nwen axaṭer rrbeḥ-nwen tesɛam-t tura.
A tawaɣit-nwen kunwi yeṛwan tura, aț-țuɣalem aț-țellaẓem. A tawaɣit-nwen kunwi yețțaḍṣan tura axaṭer aț-țilim di leḥzen d yimeṭṭawen.
A tawaɣit nwen asm'ara kkun-cekkṛen yemdanen, axaṭer akka i xedmen lejdud-nsen i lenbiya n lekdeb.
Ma d nekk a wen-iniɣ i kunwi i d-ițḥessisen : ḥemmlet iɛdawen-nwen, xedmet lxiṛ i wid i kkun-ikeṛhen.
Barket wid i kkun-ineɛlen, dɛut s lxiṛ i wid i kkun-iḍelmen.
Ma yewwet-ik yiwen ɣer lḥenk, sendi-yas lḥenk nniḍen. Ma yekkes-ak yiwen abeṛnus-ik, anef-as ad yernu ula d aqenduṛ-ik.
Efk-as ayen yuḥwaj i win i k-id-yessutren ; win i k-ikksen kra, ur țṛaǧu ara a k-t-id-yerr.
Xedmet i wiyaḍ ayen i tebɣam a wen-t xedmen i kunwi.
Ma yella tḥemmlem kan wid i kkun-iḥemmlen, d acu n lxiṛ i txedmem ? Ula d imcumen ḥemmlen wid i ten-iḥemmlen.
Ma yella txeddmem lxiṛ i wid kan i wen ixeddmen lxiṛ, d acu n lxiṛ i txedmem ? Ula d imcumen xeddmen akka.
Ma yella tṛeṭṭlem i wid kan i teẓram a wen-d-rren, d acu i trebḥem ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ? Imcumen daɣen ṛeṭṭlen i imddukal-nsen iwakken ad afen aṛeṭṭal ula d nutni.

Lameɛna kunwi : ḥemmlet iɛdawen-nwen, xedmet lxiṛ, ṛeḍlet mbla ṭṭmeɛ, akka ara tesɛum lfayda tameqqrant, ara tilim d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi ɛlayen. Axaṭer Ṛebbi d aḥnin ula ɣef yemcumen akk-d wid inekkṛen lxiṛ.
Iḥninet, sɛut ṛṛeḥma akken i ț-isɛa Baba-twen.
Ur țḥasabet ara wiyaḍ iwakken Sidi Ṛebbi ur kkun-ițḥasab ara. Ur ḥekkmet ara ɣef wiyaḍ iwakken Sidi Ṛebbi ur iḥekkem ara fell-awen. Semmḥet i wiyaḍ iwakken a wen isameḥ Sidi Ṛebbi.
Seddqet, a wen d-yuɣal s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi. Ma tseddqem mbla lkil, a wen-d yuɣal s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi mbla lkil ; axaṭer a wen-d-ițwaktal s lkil s wacu tektalem.
Yewwi-yasen-d lemtel nniḍen, yenna-yasen : Aderɣal ur izmir ara ad iṭṭef afus i uderɣal nniḍen, neɣ m'ulac ad grirben i sin ɣer yeɣzeṛ ;
anelmad werǧin yugar ccix-is, lameɛna anelmad ara yawḍen am ccix-is di tmusni, ad yili am nețța.
Acuɣeṛ tețwaliḍ axeclaw yellan di tiṭ n gma-k ur tețwaliḍ ara tigejdit yellan di tiṭ-ik ?

Amek ara tiniḍ i gma-k : eǧǧ-iyi ad kkseɣ axeclaw yellan di tiṭ-ik kečč ur neẓri tigejdit yellan di tiṭ-ik ? A bu sin wudmawen, ekkes uqbel tigejdit yellan di tiṭ-ik, imiren aț-țwaliḍ amek ara tekkseḍ axeclaw yellan di tiṭ n gma-k.
Ulac ttejṛa lɛali i d-ițțaken lfakya n diri. Ulac daɣen ttejṛa n diri i d-ițțaken lfakya lɛali.
Ihi mkul ttejṛa, tețwaɛqal s lfakya-ines. Ur d-ntekkes ara lexṛif seg isennanen, ur d-ntekkes ara daɣen tiẓurin seg inijel.
Argaz yelhan issufuɣ-ed ayen yelhan seg wugerruj yellan deg wul-is, ma d amcum d ayen n diri yellan deg ul-is i d-issufuɣ. Axaṭer d ayen yellan deg wul n wemdan i d-ițeffɣen seg imi-s.
Acuɣer i yi-d-tessawalem « A Sidi, a Sidi », ur txeddmem ara ayen i wen-d-qqaṛeɣ ?
A wen-d-iniɣ ar wuɣuṛ ițemcabi wemdan i d-ițțasen ɣuṛ-i, isellen i wawal-iw yerna yeṭṭafaṛ-it :

ițemcabi ɣer yiwen n wemdan yebnan axxam. Yeɣza, yeɣza deg wakal iwakken ad issers lsas-is ɣef wezṛu ; iḥmel-ed wasif, infel-ed ɣef wexxam-nni, meɛna ur t-issenhezz ara imi lsas-is yerṣa, yebna ɣef wezṛu akken ilaq.

Ma d win isellen i wawal-iw ur netbiɛ ara ayen i d-nniɣ, ițemcabi ɣer wemdan yebnan axxam ɣef ṛṛmel mbla lsas : iḥmel-ed wasif, infel-ed ɣef wexxam-nni, imiren kan yeɣli , lexsaṛa-s ț-țameqqrant !
Mi gekfa awal zdat widak i s-d-ismeḥsisen, yekcem ɣer temdint n Kafernaḥum.
Yiwen lqebṭan aṛumani yesɛa aqeddac i gḥemmel aṭas ; aqeddac-agi yuḍen, ițmețțat.
Mi gesla s Sidna Ɛisa, iceggeɛ ɣuṛ-es kra seg yimeqqranen n wat Isṛail iwakken a d-yas ad isseḥlu aqeddac-is.
Mi wwḍen ɣer Sidna Ɛisa, ḥellelen-t nnan-as : A Sidi ! Yuklal a s-txedmeḍ lxiṛ agi,
axaṭer iḥemmel agdud nneɣ ; d nețța i gebnan lǧameɛ-nneɣ.
Sidna Ɛisa yedda yid-sen. Mi qṛib ad yaweḍ ɣer wexxam, lqebṭan-nni iceggeɛ imdukkal-is a s-inin : A Sidi, ur țɛețțib ara iman-ik, ur uklaleɣ ara a d-tkecmeḍ axxam-iw.
Nekk s yiman-iw daɣen walaɣ ur uklaleɣ ara a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-ek ; ini-d kan yiwen wawal, aqeddac-iw ad iḥlu.
Axaṭer sɛiɣ wid i gṭebbiṛen fell-i, sɛiɣ daɣen lɛeskeṛ seddaw lḥekma-w. Ad iniɣ i yiwen ṛuḥ ad iṛuḥ ; i wayeḍ as-ed, a d-yas ; ad iniɣ i wqeddac-iw xdem ayagi, a t-ixdem.
Mi gesla Sidna Ɛisa i yimeslayen-agi, itɛeǧǧeb deg-sen. Yezzi ɣer lɣaci yeddan yid-es, yenna-yasen : A wen-d-iniɣ : di tmurt n wat Isṛail meṛṛa ur ufiɣ ara liman yecban wagi.
Widak-nni i d-ițwaceggɛen, mi uɣalen ɣer wexxam ufan aqeddac-nni yeḥla.
Azekka-nni, Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ ɣer yiwet n taddart isem-is Naɛim. Ddan yid-es inelmaden-is d waṭas n lɣaci.
Mi gewweḍ ɣer tewwurt n taddart, atnaya lɣaci wwin-d lmegget a t-meḍlen, d mmi-s n yiwet n taǧǧalt, anagar nețța i tesɛa. Aṭas n imezdaɣ n taddart-nni i d-iddan yid-es.
Mi ț-iwala Sidna Ɛisa, tɣaḍ-it, yenna-yas : Ur țru ara !
Iqeṛṛeb ɣer usenduq n lmegget nni, iḍleq afus-is innul-it, dɣa widak i t-irefden ḥebsen. Yenna : Ay aqcic ! Ekker !
Dɣa lmegget-nni ikker-ed, yebda iheddeṛ. Sidna Ɛisa yerra aqcic-nni i yemma-s.
Ikcem-iten akk lxuf, bdan țḥemmiden Ṛebbi qqaṛen : « Sidi Ṛebbi yerra-d ddehn-is ɣer wegdud is, nnbi ameqqran ikker-ed gar-aneɣ. »
Slan s wannect-agi di tmurt n Yahuda meṛṛa akk ț-țmura i s-d izzin.
Inelmaden n Yeḥya xebbṛen-t ɣef wayen akk yedṛan.
Yeḥya iceggeɛ sin seg yinelmaden-is ɣer Sidna Ɛisa iwakken a s-inin ma d nețța i d win akken ara d-yasen, neɣ ilaq ad ṛǧun wayeḍ.
Ewwḍen ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Iceggeɛ-aɣ-ed ɣuṛ-ek Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas iwakken a k-nesteqsi ma d kečč i d win akken ara d-yasen neɣ ilaq a neṛǧu wayeḍ.
Di teswiɛt-nni ufan Sidna Ɛisa isseḥla aṭas n yemdanen si lehlakat nsen d leɛyubat-nsen, issufeɣ leǧnun seg wid yețwamelken, yerra-d iẓri i waṭas n yiderɣalen.

Sidna Ɛisa yenna i yinelmaden n Yeḥya : Ṛuḥet erret lexbaṛ i Yeḥya ɣef wayen teẓram d wayen teslam : iderɣalen țwalin, wid ikerfen teddun, wid ihelken lbeṛs ṣeffun, iɛeẓẓugen sellen, lmegtin ḥeggun-d, le xbaṛ n lxiṛ ițwabecceṛ i yigellilen .
D aseɛdi win iwumi ur țțiliɣ ara d ugur.
Mi ṛuḥen inelmaden-nni i d-iceggeɛ Yeḥya, Sidna Ɛisa yebda iheddeṛ i lɣaci ɣef Yeḥya yenna : D acu i tṛuḥem a d-teẓrem deg unezṛuf ? D aɣanim yețhuzzu waḍu ?
D acu i tṛuḥem a d-teẓrem ? D amdan yelsan llebsa ifazen ? Wid yețlusun llebsa ifazen, yețɛicin di rrbeḥ atnan di lebṛuj n yigelliden !
Anwa i tṛuḥem a t-id-teẓrem ihi ? D nnbi ? A wen-d-iniɣ ... yugar nnbi !
Yeḥya d win i ɣef yura di tira iqedsen : Atan ad zzewreɣ amceggeɛ-inu zdat-ek iwakken a k-iheggi abrid.
Nniɣ-awen, ulac di ddunit amdan yugaren Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas. Lameɛna amecṭuḥ maḍi di tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi, d ameqqran fell-as.
Lɣaci meṛṛa mi slan i Yeḥya, setɛeṛfen s lḥeqq n Sidi Ṛebbi, qeblen ad țwaɣeḍsen deg waman, llan gar-asen ula d imekkasen n tebzert ( n leɣṛama ).
Ma d ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa, ur qbilen ara ayen i sen yebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi, ugin a ten yesseɣḍes Yeḥya.
?er wacu ara metleɣ imdanen n lǧil-agi ? ?er wuɣuṛ i țemcabin ?
?emcabin ɣer warrac yeqqimen di tejmaɛt, țemsawalen wway gar-asen qqaṛen : Newwet-awen-d ajewwaq ur tecḍiḥem ara, nerna newwi-yawen-d acewwiq n leḥzen ur trum ara.
Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas yusa-d ur itețț aɣṛum ur itess ccṛab, teqqaṛem ițwamlek.
Mmi-s n bunadem yusa-d itețț itess, teqqaṛem : ițxemmim kan ad yečč ad isew, d amdakkul n yimekkasen akk-d yemcumen.
Lameɛna lḥeqq n Sidi Ṛebbi ɛeqlen-t warraw-is, nutni qeblen-t.
Yiwen ufarizi yusa-d ad iɛṛrḍ Sidna Ɛisa ad yečč ɣuṛ-es. Idda yid-es, ikcem ɣer wexxam-is, yeqqim ad yečč.
Di taddart-nni tella yiwet n tmeṭṭut yellan d yir tameṭṭut ; mi tesla s Sidna Ɛisa yella deg wexxam n wufarizi-nni, tekcem tewwi yid-es tabuqalt n leɛṭer.
Tekka-d deffir Sidna Ɛisa, teɣli ɣer idaṛṛen-is tețru. Tessebzeg (tesselxes) iḍaṛṛen n Sidna Ɛisa s yimeṭṭawen-is, tesfeḍ-iten s ucebbub-is, tessudun-iten yerna tdehhin-iten s leɛṭeṛ-nni.
Afarizi-nni mi gwala annect-nni, ixemmem deg iman-is yenna : Lemmer argaz-agi d nnbi i gella, yili yeɛqel belli tameṭṭut-agi i t-ițnalen d yir tameṭṭut i tella.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna i ufarizi-nni : A Semɛun ! Bɣiɣ a k-d-iniɣ yiwen wawal ! Afarizi yerra-yas-d : Ini-d a Sidi !
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Illa yiwen umeṛkanti issekray idrimen. Ițțalas i sin yergazen, yiwen yețțalas-as xemsmeyyat alef, wayeḍ xemsin.
Imi ur sɛin ara i sin s wacu ara xelṣen, isemmeḥ-asen. Anwa deg-sen ara t-iḥemmlen akteṛ ?
Semɛun afarizi yerra-yas : Ahat d win iwumi i gsumeḥ ṭṭlaba tameqqrant. Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Tesɛiḍ lḥeqq !

Dɣa iwehha ɣer tmeṭṭut-nni, yenna i Semɛun : Twalaḍ tameṭṭut-agi ? Kecmeɣ-d ɣer wexxam-ik, ur iyi-d-tefkiḍ ara aman ad ssirdeɣ iḍaṛṛen-iw, nețțat tessared-iten s yimeṭṭawen-is terna tesfeḍ-iten s ucebbub-is.
Kečč ur d-tselmeḍ ara fell-i, nețțat segmi i d-tekcem tessudun deg iḍaṛṛen-iw.
Kečč ur tedhineḍ ara aqeṛṛuy-iw ula s zzit, ma d nețțat tesmar-ed leɛṭeṛ ɣef yiḍaṛṛen-iw.
A k-iniɣ : ddnubat-is meṛṛa țwaɛfan as daymi i d-tbeggen leḥmala tameqqrant. Ma d win iwumi yețwaɛfa ciṭuḥ, leḥmala-ines ț-țamecṭuḥt.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna i tmeṭṭut-nni : Atan țwaɛeffan-am ddnubat-im !
Inebgawen nniḍen bdan qqaṛen deg yiman-nsen : « d acu-t wergaz-agi i gessawḍen iman-is ad yeɛfu ula d ddnubat ? »
Sidna Ɛisa yenna i tmeṭṭut-nni : Imi tumneḍ yis-i tețțusellkeḍ, ṛuḥ di lehna.
Sidna Ɛisa iteddu yețbecciṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n tgeldit n Ṛebbi si temdint ɣer tayeḍ, si taddart ɣer tayeḍ. Tnac-nni yinelmaden-is ddan yid-es,
ddant daɣen kra n tilawin i gesseḥla si lehlakat-nsent, tid iwumi yessufeɣ leǧnun. Tella gar-asent Meryem iwumi qqaṛen tamagdalit ițwasellken si sebɛa leǧnun,
akk-d Yunna tameṭṭut n Cuza lewkil n ugellid Hiṛudus, Suzana akk ț-țilawin nniḍen i ten-ițɛawanen s wayen sɛant.
Lɣaci usan-d seg waṭas n tudrin. Mi d-nnejmaɛen ɣuṛ-es, Sidna Ɛisa yewwi-yasen-d lemtel-agi :
Yiwen ufellaḥ iffeɣ ad izreɛ irden. Mi gzerreɛ, kra n iɛeqqayen ɣlin ɣer webrid , țwaṛekḍen yerna ččan-ten yefṛax n igenni.
Amur nniḍen n zzerriɛa yeɣli ger yedɣaɣen , mi d-temɣi teqquṛ imi xuṣṣen waman.
Amur nniḍen yeɣli daɣen ger isennanen , mi d-temɣi zzerriɛa mɣin-d yid-es isennanen, ɣummen-ț.
Amur nniḍen daɣen yeɣli deg wakal lɛali ; mi d-mɣin, mkul aɛeqqa yefka-d meyya. Mi d-yenna ayagi, iɛeggeḍ yenna : Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen isel-ed !
Inelmaden-is ssutren-as d acu i d lmeɛna n lemtel-agi.

Yerra-yasen : Kunwi yețțunefk-awen-d aț țissinem lbaḍna n tgeldit n Ṛebbi, ma d wiyaḍ ițțunefk-asen-d a ț-issinen s lemtul kan iwakken ɣas ad ẓren s wallen-nsen ur țwalin ara, ɣas ma slan ur fehhmen ara.
Atah lmeɛna n lemtel-agi : zzerriɛa d awal n Ṛebbi.
Llan kra n yemdanen țemcabin ɣer webrid-nni anda teɣli zzerriɛa, m'ara slen i wawal, Cciṭan a d-yas a t-iqleɛ seg ulawen-nsen iwakken ur țțamnen ur țwasellaken.

Wiyaḍ țemcabin ɣer wakal yeččuṛen d idɣaɣen. M'ara slen i wawal a t-qeblen s lfeṛḥ lameɛna ur t-țaǧǧan ara ad iger izuṛan ; imiren kan ad amnen, m'ara d-yas lweqt n ujeṛṛeb țțuɣalen ɣer deffir.
Ayen yeɣlin ger isennanen, d wid isellen i wawal meɛna m'ara d-imɣi ur igemmu ara deg-sen axaṭer țțaǧan anezgum d rrbeḥ akk-d zzhu n ddunit ad iɣumm awal-nni.
Ma d ayen yețwazerɛen deg wakal lɛali, d wid isellen i wawal s wul yeṣfan d neyya ḥerzen-t yerna țțaǧan-d lxiṛ s ṣṣbeṛ-nsen.
Yiwen ur iceɛɛel taftilt iwakken a ț-iɣum s lḥila neɣ a ț-issedreg; lameɛna a ț-issers ɣef lmeṣbeḥ iwakken kra n win ara d-ikecmen ad iwali tafat.
Kra n wayen yeffren a d-iban, kra n wayen yellan di ṭṭlam a t-id-tesban tafat.
Ɛasset iman-nwen ihi ɣef wayen i tsellem, axaṭer win i gḥerzen ayen yesɛa a s-nernu, ma d win ur nḥerrez ara a s-ițwakkes ula d ayen i gɣil yesɛa-t.
Yemma-s d watmaten n Sidna Ɛisa usan-d a t-ẓren, meɛna ur zmiren ara ad qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es imi aṭas n lɣaci i gellan dinna.
Ssawḍen-as lexbaṛ nnan-as : A Sidi, yemma-k d watmaten-ik atnan di beṛṛa, bɣan a k-ẓren.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Yemma d watmaten-iw d widak ismeḥsisen i wawal n Ṛebbi yerna ttabaɛen-t.
Yiwen wass, Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer yiwet n teflukt nețța d yinelmaden-is. Yenna-yasen : Eyyaw a nzegret ɣer tama nniḍen n lebḥeṛ n Jlili. Dɣa ṛuḥen.
Mi teddun ɣef waman, Sidna Ɛisa yeṭṭes. Yekker-ed waḍu iǧehden di lebḥeṛ, taflukt tebda tețțačaṛ d aman, ikcem-iten lxuf ameqqran.
Inelmaden qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es, sekkren-t-id nnan-as : A Sidi, a Sidi, atan a neɣṛeq. Yekker-ed, dɣa yumeṛ i waḍu d lemwaji ad ḥebsen, imiren kan ters-ed talwit.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Anida-t liman-nwen ? Tɛeǧǧben, țergigin, qqaṛen wway gar-asen : Anwa-t wagi ? Izmer ad yefk lameṛ i waḍu d lebḥeṛ yerna țțaɣen as awal !
Wwḍen ɣer tama nniḍen n lebḥeṛ, ɣer tmurt n ijiṛaziyen iqublen tamurt n Jlili.
Mi d-yers Sidna Ɛisa, ataya yusa-d ɣuṛ-es yiwen wergaz n taddart nni, melken-t waṭas n leǧnun ; acḥal ur yelsi llebsa, ur yezdiɣ axxam, yețɛici di tmeqbeṛt ger iẓekwan.
Mi gwala Sidna Ɛisa, yeɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen-is iɛeggeḍ yenna : D acu i tebɣiḍ ɣuṛ-i a Ɛisa Mmi-s n Ṛebbi ɛlayen ? Di leɛnaya-k ur iyi-țɛețțib ara.

Yenna-yas-d akka axaṭer Sidna Ɛisa yefka lameṛ i uṛuḥani i t-izedɣen ad iffeɣ seg-s. Acḥal d abrid i s-cudden ifassen d iḍaṛṛen s ssnasel, nețța isseɣṛas-itent yerna aṛuḥani-nni yezzuɣuṛ-it ɣer yimukan yexlan.
Sidna Ɛisa isteqsa-t yenna-yas : Isem-ik ? yerra-yas : Tarbaɛt. Yenna-yas-d akka axaṭer aṭas n leǧnun i t-izedɣen.
?ḥellilen Sidna Ɛisa ur ten-ițceggiɛ ara ɣer yimukan n ṭṭlam.
Tella dinna yiwet n tqeḍɛit tameqqrant n yilfan kessen deg yiwet n tiɣilt. Leǧnun-nni țḥellilen Sidna Ɛisa a ten-yeǧǧ ad kecmen deg yilfan-nni ; Sidna Ɛisa iserreḥ-asen.
Imiren ffɣen seg wergaz-nni, kecmen deg yilfan, grarben seg ixef n tiɣilt ɣer lebḥeṛ, ɣeṛqen.
Imeksawen-nsen mi walan ayen yedṛan uzzlen ɣer taddart d lexlawi ad ssiwḍen lexbaṛ.
Usan-d lɣaci ɣer Sidna Ɛisa, ufan-d argaz-nni i seg d-ffɣen leǧnun yeqqim ɣer iḍaṛṛen-is, yuɣal-ed ɣer leɛqel-is, yelsa llebsa. Wehmen akk, tekcem-iten tugdi.
Wid iḥedṛen i wayen yedṛan, ḥkan amek yețwasellek umeǧnun-nni.
Imezdaɣ n tmurt uggaden, dɣa ssutren i Sidna Ɛisa ad ibɛed fell-asen. Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer teflukt iwakken ad iṛuḥ.
Argaz-nni i seg d-ffɣen leǧnun, issuter a t-yeǧǧ ad yeddu yid-es, meɛna Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas :
Uɣal ɣer wexxam-ik, teḥkuḍ ayen akk i k-ixdem Ṛebbi. Argaz-nni iṛuḥ, ikcem ɣer taddart, yeḥka meṛṛa wayen i s-ixdem Sidna Ɛisa.
Mi d-yuɣal Sidna Ɛisa, lɣaci meṛṛa i t-ițṛaǧun mmugren-t-id.
Yewweḍ-ed yiwen wergaz isem-is Jayrus, d ameqqran n lǧameɛ, yeɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen n Sidna Ɛisa, yețḥellil deg-s iwakken ad iddu ɣer wexxam is
axaṭer yesɛa yelli-s tnac yiseggasen di leɛmeṛ-is, tețmețțat yerna anagar nețțat i gesɛa. Akken ițeddu Sidna Ɛisa ɣer dinna, ḥeṛsen-t-id lɣaci si mkul lǧiha.
Tella dinna yiwet n tmeṭṭut ihelken, tnac iseggasen nețțat tessaq d idammen. Texṣeṛ ayen akk i tesɛa ɣer ṭṭebba, yiwen ur ț-isseḥla.
Tekka-d deffir Sidna Ɛisa, teḍleq afus-is, tennul iri n ubeṛnus-is, imiren kan teḥla ḥebsen idammen-nni.
Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq yenna : Anwa akka i yi-d-innulen ? Imi ssusmen meṛṛa, Buṭrus yenna yas : A Sidi, lɣaci yezzi-yak-d yerna iḥṛes-ik-id si mkul tama, kečč teqqaṛeḍ anwa i k-id-innulen !
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yella yiwen i yi-d-innulen axaṭer ḥusseɣ i kra n tezmert teffeɣ seg-i.
Tameṭṭut-nni imi twala ulamek ara teffer, tusa-d tețțergigi teɣli ɣer yiḍaṛṛen n Sidna Ɛisa, teḥka-d zdat lɣaci meṛṛa acuɣeṛ i t-tennul d wamek teḥla imiren kan si lehlak-is.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : A yell-i, imi tumneḍ yis-i teḥliḍ ! Ṛuḥ di talwit.
Mazal-it iheddeṛ, ataya yiwen wergaz yusa-d seg wexxam n Jayṛus, yewwi-yas-d lexbaṛ-agi : Yelli-k temmut ! Ur țɛețțib ara Sidna Ɛisa.
Sidna Ɛisa mi s-yesla i wergaz-nni, yenna i Jayṛus : Ur țțagad ara ! Amen kan, yelli-k aț-țeslek.
Mi gewweḍ ɣer wexxam, ur yeǧǧi yiwen ad ikcem yid-es anagar Buṭrus, Yuḥenna, Yeɛqub akk-d baba-s d yemma-s n teqcict-nni.
Wid yellan dinna țrun akk, țɣerriden ( țmeǧǧiden ) fell-as. Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Beṛka-kkun imeṭṭawen ! taqcict ur temmut ara ! D iḍes i teṭṭes.
Nutni ugin a s-d-ḥessen imi ẓran taqcict temmut.
Sidna Ɛisa yeṭṭef-iț-id seg wufus yenna-yas s taɣect ɛlayen : A taqcict, ekker !
Imiren kan yuɣal-iț-id ṛṛuḥ, tekker-ed. Sidna Ɛisa yumeṛ a s-fken ayen ara tečč.
Imawlan-is wehmen. Sidna Ɛisa iweṣṣa-ten ur țɛawaden i yiwen ayen yedṛan.
Sidna Ɛisa isnejmaɛ-ed tnac yinelmaden-is, yefka-yasen tazmert d lḥekma s wacu ara ssufɣen leǧnun, ara sseḥlun imuḍan.
Iceggeɛ-iten ad beccṛen tageldit n Ṛebbi, yerna ad sseḥlun imuḍan.
Yenna-yasen : Ur țțawit acemma yid-wen d aɛwin, ur țțawit aɛekkaz neɣ agrab (aqwrab), ur țțawit aɣṛum neɣ idrimen, ur țțawit ara daɣen sin yiqendyaṛ.
Kra n win ara yestṛeḥben yis wen, qqimet deg wexxam-is alamma tṛuḥem.
Ma d anda ur stṛeḥben ara yis-wen, m'ara teffɣem si taddart-nni, zwit ula d aɣebbaṛ-is seg yiḍaṛṛen nwen, iwakken aț-țcehdem fell-asen belli d nutni i kkun-yugin.
Ṛuḥen, țeddun si taddart ɣer tayeḍ, țbecciṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ, sseḥlayen imuḍan di mkul amkan.
Hiṛudus lḥakem n tmurt n Jlili, yeɛweq mi gesla s wayen yedṛan meṛṛa, axaṭer kra n yemdanen qqaṛen : « d Yeḥya i d-iḥyan si ger lmegtin ! »
Wiyaḍ qqaṛen : « d Sidna Ilyas i d-yuɣalen ! » Neɣ : « ahat d yiwen si lenbiya n zik i d-iḥyan ! »
Lameɛna Hiṛudus yeqqaṛ : « Yeḥya kkseɣ-as aqeṛṛuy ! Anwa-t ihi wagi i ɣef selleɣ annect-agi ? » Dɣa ițqellib ad iẓer Sidna Ɛisa.
Mi d-uɣalen ṛṛusul n Sidna Ɛisa, bdan ḥekkun-as ayen akk i xedmen. Yewwi-ten yid-es ɣer yiwen wemkan, ɣer tama n taddart n Bitsayda akken ad qqimen weḥḥed-sen.
Mi slan anda yella lɣaci tebɛen-t. Nețța yesteṛḥeb yis-sen, yebda iheddeṛ-asen ɣef tgeldit n Ṛebbi, yesseḥla daɣen wid ihelken.

Akken qṛib ad yeɣli yiṭij, tnac-nni n ṛṛusul usan-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Serreḥ i lɣaci ad ṛuḥen ɣer temdinin ț-țudrin iqeṛben iwakken ad afen ayen ara ččen d wanda ara ṭsen, axaṭer aql-aɣ deg wemkan yexlan.

Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Fket-asen kunwi s yiman-nwen ayen ara ččen. Erran-as : ?uṛ-nneɣ anagar xemsa teḥbulin n weɣṛum d sin yiselman. Neɣ tebɣiḍ a nṛuḥ nukni a d-naɣ ayen ara ččen lɣaci-agi ?
Llan dinna azal n xemsa alaf n yergazen. Sidna Ɛisa yenna i yinelmaden-is : Feṛqet lɣaci ț-țirebbaɛ n xemsin xemsin, tesɣimem-ten.
Ṛuḥen sɣimen-ten akken i sen-d yenna.
Sidna Ɛisa yerfed allen-is ɣer yigenni, yeḥmed Ṛebbi icekkeṛ-it, yeddem-ed xemsa-nni teḥbulin n weɣṛum d sin-nni iselman yebḍa-ten, yefka-ten i inelmaden-is a ten- feṛqen i lɣaci.
?čan akk armi ṛwan, yerna ččuṛen tnac yiḍellaɛen s wayen i d-yugran.
Yiwen wass Sidna Ɛisa yeqqim weḥd-es yețẓalla. Inelmaden-is qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es dɣa isteqsa-ten yenna-yasen : D acu-yi ɣer lɣaci ?
Rran-as : Kra qqaṛen d Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas ; wiyaḍ d Sidna Ilyas i d-yuɣalen ; ma d kra nniḍen qqaṛen d yiwen si lenbiya n zik i d-iḥyan si ger lmegtin.
Yenna-yasen : I kunwi, d acu-yi ɣuṛ-wen ? Yenṭeq Buṭrus yenna-yas : D kečč i d Lmasiḥ n Ṛebbi.
Sidna Ɛisa iweṣṣa-ten ur qqaṛen i yiwen belli d nețța i d Lmasiḥ.
Yenna-yasen daɣen : Ilaq Mmi-s n bunadem ad yeɛteb aṭas. A t-nekkṛen lecyux d lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d lɛulama n ccariɛa yerna a t-nɣen, lameɛna ass wis tlata a d-iḥyu si ger lmegtin.
Yenna daɣen i lɣaci : Win yebɣan ad iddu yid-i ur ilaq ara ad ixemmem ɣef tudert-is ; ilaq ad iqbel ad yenɛețțab yal ass ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw yerna ad yetbeɛ abrid-iw.
Axaṭer win yebɣan ad isellek tudert-is a s-tṛuḥ. Ma d win iwumi ara tṛuḥ ɣef ddemma-w ad yuɣal a ț-yaf.
D acu i d lfayda n wemdan ara irebḥen ddunit meṛṛa ma yesṛuḥ tudert-is neɣ issenger iman-is ?
Atan win issetḥan yis-i neɣ s yimeslayen iw, ad issetḥi yis Mmi-s n bunadem m'ara d-yas di tmanegt-is ț-țmanegt n Baba Ṛebbi akk-d lmalayekkat iqedsen.
A wen-d-iniɣ tideț, llan gar-awen wid ur nețmețțat ara alamma walan Tageldit n Ṛebbi.
Ɛeddan azal n tmanya wussan segmi i d-yenna imeslayen-agi. Sidna Ɛisa yewwi yid-es Buṭrus, Yuḥenna d Yeɛqub, yuli ɣer wedrar ad iẓẓall.
Mi gella ideɛɛu yenbeddal wudem-is, llebsa-s tuɣal ț-țamellalt tețfeǧǧiǧ am yiṭij.
Taswiɛt kan bedden-d ɣuṛ-es sin yergazen heddṛen yid-es : d Sidna Musa akk-d Sidna Ilyas.
Banen-ed di tafat tameqqrant, țmeslayen yid-es ɣef lmut-is ara yedṛun di temdint n Lquds.
Buṭrus d yimdukkal-is yewwi ten yiḍes. Mi d-endekwalen, walan tamanegt n Sidna Ɛisa akk-d wid yellan yid-es.

Mi kkren ad ṛuḥen sin-nni yergazen, yenṭeq Buṭrus ɣer Sidna Ɛisa yenna : A Sidi, acḥal yelha m'akka nella dagi ! Ma tebɣiḍ a nesbedd tlata yiqiḍunen, yiwen i kečč, yiwen i Sidna Musa wayeḍ i Sidna Ilyas. Yenna-d akka, axaṭer ur yeẓri d acu i d-iqqaṛ !
Mazal-it iheddeṛ mi ten-id-tɣumm yiwet n tagut. Buṭrus d imdukkal-is ikcem-iten lxuf d ameqqran.
Iffeɣ-ed yiwen n ṣṣut si tagut-nni yenna-d : Wagi d Mmi, d nețța i xtaṛeɣ, smeḥsiset-as.
Mi geḥbes ṣṣut-nni, walan anagar Sidna Ɛisa. Deg ussan-nni, inelmaden ur ḥkin i yiwen ayen ẓran.
Azekka-nni mi d-ṣubben seg wedrar, aṭas n lɣaci i d-immugren Sidna Ɛisa.
Atah yiwen wergaz iɛeggeḍ-ed si ger lɣaci yenna : A Sidi, di leɛnaya-k muqel-ed ɣer mmi, ala nețța i sɛiɣ !
Ikcem-it uṛuḥani, tiswiɛin m'ara t-ițhuccu, yețɛeggiḍ alamma ffɣent-ed tkufta seg imi-s, ur as-ițserriḥ ara alamma yerẓa-t akk.
?elleleɣ inelmaden-ik a t-ssufɣen seg-s, lameɛna ur zmiren ara.
Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq yenna : A lǧil ijehlen iɛewjen, ar melmi ara yiliɣ yid-wen, ara wen-sebṛeɣ ? Awi-d mmi-k ɣer dagi !

Akken i d-iqeṛṛeb weqcic-nni, aṛuḥani isseglallez-it di lqaɛa armi i d-țeffɣent tkufta seg yimi-s. Sidna Ɛisa yefka lameṛ i uṛuḥani-nni iwakken a t-iffeɣ. Aqcic-nni yeḥla, Sidna Ɛisa yerra-t i baba-s.
Lɣaci meṛṛa wehmen di tezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi. Imi tɛeǧǧben akk s wayen i gxeddem, Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq ɣer yinelmaden-is yenna :
?esset-ed mliḥ i wayen ara wen-d-iniɣ tura : « Mmi-s n bunadem ad ițțusellem ger ifassen n yemdanen. »
Inelmaden-is ur fhimen ara imeslayen-agi, lmeɛna-ines tețwaffer fell-asen iwakken ur t-fehmen ara yerna kukran a t-steqsin.
Inelmaden țmeslayen wway gar-asen, țmesteqsayen anwa i d ameqqran deg-sen.
Sidna Ɛisa yeẓran ayen țxemmimen deg ulawen-nsen, ikker yeddem-ed yiwen weqcic isbedd-it zdat-es,
yenna-yasen : Win iqeblen aqcic am wagi ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw d nekk i geqbel, win i yi-qeblen, yeqbel win i yi-d iceggɛen. Win yessimẓiyen iman-is gar-awen d nețța i d ameqqran.
Yuḥenna yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi, neẓra yiwen wergaz yessuffuɣ leǧnun s yisem-ik, nebɣa a s-neqḍeɛ imi ur k-itbiɛ ara am nukni.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Ur s-țțagit ara ! Win ur wen-d neffiɣ ara d aɛdaw, yid-wen i gella !
Mi qṛib a d-awḍen wussan i deg ara yețwarfed ɣer igenwan, Sidna Ɛisa yeqsed ad iṛuḥ ɣer temdint n Lquds.
Yessezwer imceggɛen zdat-es iwakken a s-heggin ayen ilaqen. Kecmen ɣer yiwet n taddart n yisamariyen,
lameɛna ugin ad stṛeḥben yis imi slan ɣer temdint n Lquds i gteddu.
Yeɛqub d Yuḥenna mi ẓran ayagi, nnan : A Sidi, tebɣiḍ a nefk lameṛ i tmes n yigenni a d-teɣli fell-asen a ten tessenger ?
Sidna Ɛisa yezzi ɣuṛ-sen, iɛeggeḍ fell-asen yenna : Acuɣeṛ i tețxemmimem akka ?
Mmi-s n bunadem ur d-yusi ara ad issenger imdanen lameɛna yusa-d a ten-isellek. Dɣa ṛuḥen ɣer taddart nniḍen.
Mi teddun deg webrid, yiwen wergaz yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi, anda teddiḍ ad dduɣ !
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Uccanen ɣuṛ-sen lɣiṛan, ifṛax n yigenni sɛan leɛcuc, ma d Mmi-s n bunadem ur yesɛi ara anda ara yessers aqeṛṛuy-is.
Dɣa yenna i yiwen nniḍen : Eyya-d aț-țedduḍ yid-i. Yerra-yas : A Sidi, serreḥ-iyi uqbel ad ṛuḥeɣ ad meḍleɣ baba.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Eǧǧ wid yemmuten ad meḍlen lmegtin-nsen, ma d kečč eyya-d aț-țbecṛeḍ tageldit n Ṛebbi.
Wayeḍ yenṭeq yenna-yas : Ad dduɣ yid-ek a Sidi, lameɛna eǧǧ-iyi ad ṛuḥeɣ ad sellmeɣ ɣef wat wexxam-iw.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Kra n win yeṭṭfen lmaɛun, yețmuqul ɣer deffir, ur yenfiɛ ara i tgelda n Ṛebbi.
Syenna, Sidna Ɛisa yextaṛ-ed tnin usebɛin yinelmaden nniḍen, iceggeɛ-iten sin sin ad ṛuḥen ɣer mkul taddart d mkul amkan anda ilaq ad iṛuḥ ula d nețța.
Yenna-yasen : Tamegra meqqṛet meɛna drus yixeddamen i gellan. Dɛut ihi ɣer Bab n tmegra iwakken a d-iceggeɛ ixeddamen ɣer yigran-is.
Atan a kkun-ceggɛeɣ am izamaren ger wuccanen.
Ur țțawit yid-wen idrimen, ur țțawit aɛwin neɣ tayuga nniḍen n yerkasen. Deg webrid-nwen ur sṛuḥuyet ara lweqt di sslam.
Kra n wexxam ara tkecmem init : sslam n Ṛebbi fell-awen ay at wexxam !
Ma yella dinna walebɛaḍ d imhenni, sslam-nwen ad yers fell-as, neɣ m'ulac lehna-nwen aț-țeqqim ɣuṛ-wen.
Qqimet deg wexxam-nni, ččet swet ayen ara wen-d-fken, axaṭer axeddam yuklal lexlaṣ-is. Ur țṛuḥut ara seg wexxam ɣer wayeḍ.
Mkul taddart ara tkecmem, ma stṛeḥben yis-wen ččet ayen ara wen-d-ssersen.
Sseḥlut imuḍan-nsen, init-asen : tageldit n Ṛebbi tewweḍ-ed ɣuṛ-wen.
Lameɛna mkul taddart ara tkecmem m'ur stṛeḥben ara yis-wen, effɣet ɣer yizenqan-nsen init :
« a nezwi ula d aɣebbaṛ n taddart-nwen i d-ineṭḍen deg yiḍaṛṛen nneɣ, meɛna ḥṣut belli tageldit n Ṛebbi tewweḍ-ed ɣuṛ-wen.
Aql-i nniɣ-awen, ass n lḥisab taddart-agi aț-țețțuɛaqeb akteṛ n temdint n ?udum.

A nnger-im a tamdint n Kurazim, a nnger-im a Bitsayda ! A lukan lbeṛhanat yețwaxedmen deg kkunt țwaxedmen di temdinin n ?ur akk-d Sidun, tili imezdaɣ-nsent acḥal aya segmi sburren ticekkaṛin n leḥzen, sexnunnsen iman-nsen deg iɣiɣden iwakken a d-beggnen belli ndemmen, uɣalen-d ɣer webrid.
?ef wannect-agi, ass n lḥisab a ț-țețțuɛaqbemt akteṛ n temdinin n ?ur d Sidun.
I kemmini a tamdint n Kafernaḥum, tɣileḍ aț-țaliḍ ɣer yigenni ? Xaṭi ! ?er tesraft lqayen n laxeṛt ara tețwaḍeggṛeḍ.
Win i wen-ismeḥsisen ismeḥsis-iyi-d i nekk. Win ur kkun-neqbil d nekk ur geqbil ara, win ur iyi-neqbil ara, ur iqbil ara Win i yi-d-iceggɛen.
Tnin usebɛin-nni yinelmaden uɣalen-d ččuṛen d lfeṛḥ, nnan-as : A Sidi, ula d leǧnun țțagaden-aɣ s yisem-ik.
Yenna-yasen : Walaɣ Cciṭan yeɣli-d am lebṛaq seg yigenni.
Slet-ed i wayen ara wen-iniɣ : ț-țideț fkiɣ-awen tazmert s wayes ara tṛekḍem izerman ț-țɣerdmiwin, aț-țmeḥqem lǧehd n weɛdaw yerna ulac ayen ara wen-izemren ;
lameɛna ur feṛṛḥet ara imi i tḥekkmem ɣef leǧnun, feṛḥet imi ismawen-nwen țwajerden deg igenwan.

Imiren kan, Sidna Ɛisa yeččuṛ-it Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen s lfeṛḥ, yenṭeq yenna : Tanemmirt a Baba, kečč yellan d Bab n yigenwan d lqaɛa, imi ayen akk i teffreḍ ɣef lɛuqal d yimusnawen tbeggneḍ-t-id i yimecṭuḥen. Tanemmirt a Baba Ṛebbi aḥnin axaṭer d wagi i d lebɣi-k.
Baba yerra kullec ger ifassen-iw. Yiwen ur yeẓri d acu-yi anagar Baba Ṛebbi, yiwen ur issin Baba Ṛebbi anagar Mmi-s akk-d win iwumi yebɣa Mmi-s a t-id-isbeggen.
Dɣa yezzi ɣer yinelmaden-is yenna-yasen : Amarezg n wid iwalan ayen tețwalim !
Aql-i nniɣ-awen : aṭas n lenbiya d waṭas n yigelliden i gebɣan ad ẓren ayen i tẓerrem ur t-ẓrin, i gebɣan ad slen ayen i tsellem ur t-slin.
Ikred yiwen umusnaw n ccariɛa yebɣan ad ijeṛṛeb Sidna Ɛisa, yenna yas : A Sidi, d acu ara xedmeɣ iwakken ad sɛuɣ tudert n dayem ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : D acu yuran di ccariɛa n Musa ? D acu i tfehmeḍ deg-s mi ț-teɣriḍ ?
Yerra-yas-d : Aț-țḥemmleḍ Sidi Ṛebbi s wul-ik d ṛṛuḥ-ik, s wayen yellan di tezmert-ik akk-d lɛeqliya-k. Aț-țḥemmleḍ daɣen wiyaḍ am yiman-ik .
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ayen akka i d-tenniḍ ț-țideț, exdem akka aț-țesɛuḍ tudert n dayem !
Lɛalem-nni n ccariɛa yebɣan ad yefk lḥeqq i yiman-is, yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : Anwa-ten wiyaḍ-agi ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yiwen wergaz iṣubb-ed si temdint n Lquds ɣer temdint n Yiriku ; sqaṭɛen-as yimakaren ɛerran-t rnan wten-t, ṛuḥen ǧǧan-t ur yemmut ur iddir.
Iɛedda-d syenna yiwen lmuqeddem n ccariɛa ; mi t-iwala iwwet iɛedda si tama nniḍen.
Iɛedda-d daɣen seg webrid-nni yiwen wemṛabeḍ n at Lewwi, iwala-t, ikemmel abrid-is iṛuḥ.
Ataya yiwen wubeṛṛani n tmurt n Samarya, iwweḍ-ed ɣuṛ-es, mi t-iwala iɣaḍ-it.
Iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-es, idhen leǧruḥ-is s zzit d ccṛab, icudd iten ; isserkeb-it ɣef zzayla-s, yewwi-t ɣer yiwen wexxam n yemsafren, ilha-d yid-es.
Azekka-nni yefka sin yiṣurdiyen i bab n wexxam-nni, yenna-yas : « Bedd ɣuṛ-es, ayen ara tṣeṛṛfeḍ n zzyada fell-as, a k-t-id-kemmleɣ asm'ara d-uɣaleɣ. »
Di tlata-agi, anwa i gḥemmlen am yiman-is argaz-agi yețțuɛerran ?
Amusnaw n ccariɛa yerra-yas : D win akken iḥunnen fell-as, i s ixedmen lxiṛ. Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ṛuḥ ula d kečč exdem akken.
Deg webrid-nsen ɣer temdint n Lquds, Sidna Ɛisa yekcem ɣer yiwet n taddart. Yiwet n tmeṭṭut isem is Marṭa teɛṛeḍ-it ɣer wexxam-nsen.
Tesɛa weltma-s isem-is Meryem, teqqim-ed ɣer iḍaṛṛen n Sidna Ɛisa, tesmeḥsis i wawal-is.
Marṭa tqeddec yečča-ț ccɣel, tusa-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa tenna-yas : A Sidi, ur ak-tewqiɛ ara lmeɛna imi iyi-teǧǧa weltma ad qedceɣ weḥd-i ? Ini-yas aț-țekker a yi-tɛiwen.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : A Maṛta, tețḥebbiṛeḍ tețqelliqeḍ iman-im ɣef waṭas n tɣawsiwin ;
lameɛna yiwet kan i gṣeḥḥan ! Meryem textaṛ ayen ilaqen yerna yiwen ur as-t-ițekkes.
Yiwen wass, Sidna Ɛisa yețẓalla deg yiwen wemkan. Mi gfukk, yiwen seg yinelmaden-is yenna-yas : A Sidi, selmed-aɣ amek ara neẓẓal akken yesselmed Yeḥya i yinelmaden-is.
Yenna-yasen : M'ara tẓallem, init : A Baba Ṛebbi, isem-ik ad ițwaqeddes, lḥekma n tgeldit-ik a d-tas.
Yal ass efk-aɣ-d aɣṛum-nneɣ.
Semmeḥ-aɣ ddnubat-nneɣ akken i nețsamaḥ ula d nukkni i wid i ɣ-ixedmen cceṛ, ur aɣ-țaǧǧa ara a neɣli deg wujeṛṛeb.
Yenna-yasen daɣen : Ma yella yiwen deg-wen yesɛa aḥbib, iṛuḥ ɣuṛ-es di țnaṣfa n yiḍ a s-yini : « Ay aḥbib ṛḍel-iyi-d tlata teḥbulin n weɣṛum ,
atan yusa-yi-d yiwen weḥbib i geṭṭef webrid, ur sɛiɣ d acu ara s-d-sserseɣ. »
Ma yerra-yas-d si zdaxel n wexxam : « Ur iyi-țɛețțib ara, tawwurt tsekkeṛ, nekk d warraw-iw aql-aɣ neṭṭes, ur zmireɣ ara a d-kkreɣ iwakken a k-d-fkeɣ aɣṛum. »
A wen-d-iniɣ : ma yeɛdez ur yebɣi ara a d-yekker ɣuṛ-es ɣas akken d aḥbib-is, a d-ikker a s-d-yefk ayen akk i s-issuter axaṭer yusa-d ɣuṛ es di țnaṣfa n yiḍ yeṛṛez-as aqeṛṛuy-is.
Ma d nekk nniɣ-awen : ssutret a wen-d-ițunefk, qellbet aț-țafem, sqerbebbet di tewwurt a wen-d-ldin.
Axaṭer kra n win yessuturen a s-d ițunefk, win ițqelliben ad yaf, win yesṭebṭuben a s-d-ldin tawwurt.
Anwa deg-wen ara yefken i mmi-s adɣaɣ ma yessuter-as aɣṛum ? Neɣ a s-yefk azrem ma yessuter-as aslem ?
Neɣ ma yessuter-as tamellalt a s-yefk tiɣirdemt ?
Ma yella kunwi yellan d imcumen tessnem aț-țefkem ayen yelhan i warraw-nwen, amek Baba-twen yellan deg igenni ur d-ițțak ara Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i wid i s-t-issuturen ?
Yiwen wass ikker Sidna Ɛisa yessuffeɣ lǧen yesgugmen yiwen wergaz. Mi t-iffeɣ lǧen, argaz-nni yebda iheddeṛ ; lɣaci meṛṛa wehmen.
Lameɛna kra deg-sen nnan : « D Balzabul iḥekmen ɣef leǧnun i s-yefkan tazmert akken a ten issuffeɣ. »
Kra nniḍen bɣan a t-jeṛṛben, ssutren-as yiwen n lbeṛhan ara d-yasen seg yigenni.
Sidna Ɛisa yessnen ixemmimen-nsen yenna yasen : Yal tagelda i deg ara țnaɣen imezdaɣ-is wway gar-asen tețțeddu ɣer nnger, ixxamen-is ad ɣlin.
Ma yella Cciṭan yețnaɣ d yiman-is amek ara tdum tgelda-s ? Teqqaṛem s Balzabul i ssufuɣeɣ leǧnun !
Ma yella nekk s Balzabul i ten-ssufuɣeɣ, anwa ihi i sen-ițțaken tazmert i yinelmaden-nwen iwakken a ten-ssuffuɣen ? Daymi d nutni ara kkun-iḥasben.
Lameɛna ma yella s ufus n Ṛebbi i ten-ssuffuɣeɣ, ațan ihi tageldit n Ṛebbi tewweḍ-ed ɣuṛ-wen.
Argaz iǧehden yesɛan leslaḥ, ițɛassan ɣef wexxam-is, ṛṛezq-is ad yili di laman.
Ma yusa-d ɣuṛ-es yiwen iǧehden akteṛ-is iɣleb-it, a s-ikkes leslaḥ ɣef wacu yețkel, ad yernu ad ifṛeq i wiyaḍ ayen akk yesɛa.
Win ur nelli ara yid-i, d axṣim-iw ; win ur njemmeɛ ara yid-i, yețḍeggiɛ.
M'ara yeffeɣ uṛuḥani seg yiwen wergaz, ad iṛuḥ ɣer yimukan yexlan akken ad iqelleb ɣef ṛṛaḥa. M'ur yufi ara, ad yini : « ad uɣaleɣ ɣer tnezduɣt-iw ansi i d-ffɣeɣ. »
M'ara yaweḍ ɣer tnezduɣt-nni, a ț-yaf zeddiget, tqeɛɛed ;
imiren ad iṛuḥ a d-yawi sebɛa yiṛuḥaniyen nniḍen iweɛṛen akteṛ-is, ad kecmen ad zedɣen deg-s ; s wakka lḥala n wergaz-nni aț-țenṭeṛ akteṛ n tikkelt tamezwarut.
Mi d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa ayagi, yiwet n tmeṭṭut tenṭeq-ed s ṣṣut ɛlayen si ger n lɣaci tenna-yas : ?-țaseɛdit tmeṭṭut i k-id-yurwen, i k-issuṭṭḍen !
Lameɛna nețța yerra-yas : Iseɛdiyen, d wid ismeḥsisen i wawal n Ṛebbi, yerna ḥerzen-t.
Mi d-innejmaɛ ɣuṛ-es waṭas n lɣaci, Sidna Ɛisa yekker yenna-yasen : Lǧil-agi d lǧil amcum, yessutur lbeṛhan ! Ur as-d-ițunefkay ara lbeṛhan anagar win n nnbi Yunes !
Axaṭer akken yella nnbi Yunes d lbeṛhan i yimezdaɣ n temdint n Ninebi, ara yili Mmi-s n bunadem d lbeṛhan i lǧil-agi.

Ass n lḥisab tagellit n tmurt n usammer a d-tekker ɣer yemdanen n lǧil-agi a ten-tesseḍlem imi nețțat tusa-d seg yixef n ddunit iwakken aț-țsel i tmusni n ugellid Sliman. Atah yella gar-awen win yugaren agellid Sliman !

Ass n lḥisab a d-kkren daɣen imezdaɣ n temdint n Ninebi ɣer lǧil-agi a ten-sḍelmen, axaṭer nutni uɣalen-d ɣer webrid mi sen-ibecceṛ nnbi Yunes. Kunwi tesɛam dagi gar-awen win yugaren nnbi Yunes !
Yiwen ur iceɛɛel taftilt iwakken a ț-iffer neɣ akken a ț-iɣumm s lḥila, lameɛna a ț-issers ɣef lmeṣbeḥ iwakken kra n win ara d-ikecmen ad iwali tafat.
Tiṭ ț-țaftilt n wemdan. Ma yella tiṭ-ik tṣeḥḥa aț-țiliḍ di tafat, meɛna ma tedderɣel aț-țiliḍ di ṭṭlam.
?ader ihi aț-țuɣal tafat yellan deg-k d ṭṭlam.
Ma telliḍ di tafat s lekmal-ik, ur yețțili ara deg-k ṭṭlam, aț-țiliḍ di tafat am teftilt m'ara d-cceɛceɛ fell-ak.
Mi gfukk Sidna Ɛisa ameslay, iɛreḍ-it yiwen wufarizi ɣeṛ imensi.
Afarizi-nni yewhem mi gwala Sidna Ɛisa ur issared ara uqbel ad yečč, akken tella di lɛadda-nsen.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Kunwi s yifariziyen tessiridem taqbuct d uḍebṣi s wufella kan ma zdaxel n wulawen teččuṛem d ṭṭmeɛ akk-d ddɣel.
A wid iɣeflen ! Eɛni win i d ixelqen ayen yellan s wufella, mačči d nețța i d-ixelqen ayen n daxel ?
Fket lweɛda s wulawen-nwen, imiren kullec ad awen-yeṣfu.

A nnger-nwen ay ifariziyen ! Kunwi yețɛecciṛen nneɛneɛ d uwermi d wayen i d-ițemɣayen di tebḥirt, ma d lḥeqq d leḥmala n Sidi Ṛebbi tețțarram-ten ɣer deffir ; d annect-agi i gezwaren mbla ma tețțum ayen nniḍen.
A nnger-nwen ay ifariziyen ! Tḥemmlem imukan imezwura di leǧwameɛ, tḥemmlem ad țsellimen fell-awen yemdanen deg iberdan.
A nnger-nwen, kunwi yecban iẓekwan i gɣumm wakal, ur d-nețban ara, ɛeffsen-ten yemdanen ur d-wwin s lexbaṛ.
Yenṭeq yiwen lɛalem n ccariɛa, yenna-yas : A Sidi, atan tregmeḍ-aɣ ula d nukkni s wayen i d-tenniḍ akka !
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : A nnger-nwen ula d kunwi a lɛulama n ccariɛa ! Tețɛebbim i wiyaḍ tiɛekkmin ẓẓayen, ma d kunwi ur tent-tețnalem ara ula s yiwen uḍaḍ.
A tawaɣit-nwen ! Lejdud-nwen nɣan lenbiya, kunwi tbennum-asen iẓekwan.
S wakka i d-tesbegnem belli tqeblem ayen i xedmen yerna tețkemmilem di tikli-nsen ; axaṭer nutni nɣan-ten, kunwi tbennum-asen iẓekwan.
?ef wayagi Sidi Ṛebbi yeẓran kullec yenna : a sen-ceggɛeɣ lenbiya d ṛṛusul, kra a ten-nɣen kra a ten qehṛen.
Daymi lǧil-agi ad ițțuḥaseb ɣef tazzla n yidammen n lenbiya seg wasmi i d-texleq ddunit ;
seg yidammen n Habil mmi-s n Adem armi d idammen n Zakarya i nɣan ger udekkan n iseflawen d lǧameɛ iqedsen. Lǧil-agi ad ițțuḥaseb ɣef ayagi meṛṛa.
A tawaɣit-nwen a lɛulama n ccariɛa ! Teṭṭfem tasaruț n tmusni, ur tekcimem kunwi, ur teǧǧim ad kecmen wid yebɣan.
Mi geffeɣ Sidna Ɛisa, lɛulama n ccariɛa d ifariziyen ḥeṛsen-t iwakken a d-immeslay ɣef waṭas n tɣawsiwin nniḍen,
țqelliben amek ara t-id-sseɣlin deg wawal.
Di teswiɛt-nni kan, lɣaci yennejmaɛ-ed s luluf armi țemyeɛfasen. Sidna Ɛisa yenna i yinelmaden-is : ?adret iman-nwen ɣef temtunt ( iɣes ) n yifariziyen, axaṭer d at sin wudmawen.
Kra n wayen iɣummen a d-iban, kra n wayen yeffren ad yemẓer.
Ayen i thedṛem di ṭṭlam a t-slen di tafat, ayen i tennam ɣer umeẓẓuɣ di texxamt ad ițțuberreḥ deg yizenqan.
A wen-d-iniɣ i kunwi yellan d iḥbiben-iw : ur țțagadet ara wid ineqqen lǧețța, sennig lmut ur zmiren ad xedmen acemma nniḍen.
A wen-d-iniɣ anwa i glaq aț- țaaggadem : aggadet win izemren a kkun-ikkes si ddunit yerna a kkun-iḍeggeṛ ɣer ǧahennama. Atan nniɣ-awen-t-id, d nețța i glaq aț- țaggadem.
D acu i swan xemsa iẓiwcen ? Anaɣ sin iṣurdiyen kan ! Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi ur itețțu ula d yiwen deg-sen.
Ula d anẓaden n iqeṛṛay-nwen țwaḥesben yiwen yiwen. Ur țțagadet ara ihi, teswam akteṛ n iẓiwcen.
A wen-d-iniɣ : kra n win ara d-icehden zdat yemdanen belli yumen yis-i, Mmi-s n bunadem ur t-inekkeṛ ara zdat lmalayekkat,
ma d win ara yi-nekṛen zdat yemdanen, ula d nekk a t-nekkṛeɣ zdat lmalayekkat n Ṛebbi.
Kra n win ara yewten di Mmi-s n bunadem a s-ițusemmeḥ, ma d win ara iregmen Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ulac fell-as ssmaḥ.
M'ara kkun-awin ad ḥekmen fell-awen di leǧwameɛ zdat lecyux d lḥekkam, ur țxemmimet ara amek ara tsellkem iman-nwen neɣ ɣef wayen ara d-tinim,
axaṭer d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ara wen-d-ifken di teswiɛt-nni ayen ilaqen a t-id-tinim.
Yiwen wergaz inṭeq-ed si ger n lɣaci yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi, ini-yas i gma ad ibḍu yid-i lweṛt i d-iǧǧa baba-tneɣ.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Ay argaz, anwa i yi-sbedden iwakken ad bḍuɣ gar-awen ?
Dɣa yenna i lɣaci : ?adret iman-nwen ɣef ṭṭmeɛ imi tudert n wemdan ur d-tekki ara seg wayen yesɛa ɣas akken di rrbeḥ ameqqran i gella.
Imiren yewwi-yasen-d lemtel agi : Yiwen umeṛkanti, yesɛa tamurt tefka-d aṭas n lɣella.
Ixemmem deg iman-is, yenna : « amek ara xedmeɣ imi ur sɛiɣ ara amkan anda ara jemɛeɣ leṛẓaq-iw ?
Ad huddeɣ ikuffan-iw, ad bnuɣ wiyaḍ d imeqqranen iwakken ad jemɛeɣ irden-iw d leṛẓaq-iw meṛṛa.
Imiren ad iniɣ i yiman-iw : « atan tesxezneḍ leṛẓaq i waṭas n iseggasen ; steɛfu tura, ečč, sew tezhuḍ. »
Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yenna yas-d : « a win iɣeflen ! Iḍ-agi ad a k-ddmeɣ ṛṛuḥ-ik ! Ayen meṛṛa i tjemɛeḍ, iwumi ara d-yeqqim ? »
Akka i tdeṛṛu d win ijemɛen leṛẓaq i yiman-is, wala ad ixdem ɣef laxeṛt-is, ad yili d ameṛkanti ɣer Ṛebbi.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna daɣen i yinelmaden-is : ?ef wayagi i wen-d-qqaṛeɣ ur țḥebbiṛet ara ɣef tudert-nwen, ɣef wayen ara teččem d wayen ara telsem.
Axaṭer tudert-nwen tugar lqut, lǧețța-nwen tugar llebsa.
Walit tigerfiwin , ur zerrɛent ur meggrent , ur sɛint akufi ur sɛint acbayli meɛna Sidi Ṛebbi ițɛeyyic itent. Acḥal teswam akteṛ n yefṛax n igenni !
Anwa deg-wen i gzemren s uḥebbeṛ ad yessiɣzef leɛmeṛ-is ula s yiwen n wass ?
Imi ur tezmirem ara i tɣawsiwin timecṭuḥin, acuɣeṛ i tețḥebbiṛem ɣef wayen nniḍen ?
Walit amek gemmun ijeǧǧigen n lexla ! Ur țellmen ur ẓeṭṭen ! Atan qqaṛeɣ-awen : ula d agellid Sliman s yiman-is di ccan-is, ur yelsi am yiwen seg yijeǧǧigen-agi.
Ma yella Sidi Ṛebbi yeslusu akka leḥcic yellan ass-agi di lexla, azekka ad iṛeɣ di tmes, amek ur kkun-islusu ara kunwi, ay imdanen ixuṣṣen di liman !
Ur țḥebbiṛet ara ihi ! Ur țqellibet ara ɣef wayen ara teččem d wayen ara teswem,
axaṭer d imdanen ur nețțamen ara s Ṛebbi i gețqelliben ɣef wayagi meṛṛa. Baba-twen yellan deg yigenwan yeẓra ayen teḥwaǧem.
Qellbet axiṛ ɣef tgeldit n Ṛebbi, ayen nniḍen meṛṛa d nețța ara wen-t-id ifken.
Ur țțagad ara a taqeḍɛit illan tamecṭuḥt, axaṭer iɛǧeb-as i Baba Ṛebbi a wen-d-yefk tageldit-is.
Zzenzet ayen tesɛam, tsedqem-t. Heggit i yiman-nwen deg yigenwan agerruj ur nkeffu, ur nrekku, dinna ulac imakaren ara t-yakren, ulac ibeɛɛac ara t-iččen.
Axaṭer anda yella ugerruj-ik, dinna ara yili wul-ik.
Heggit iman-nwen, ɛiwzet, beggset ɣef yiman-nwen tceɛlem tiftilin-nwen !
Ilit am wid yețṛaǧun amɛellem nsen ara d-yuɣalen si tmeɣṛa ; akken kan ara d-yesqeṛbeb a s-ldin tawwurt.
Amarezg n yiqeddacen-agi ara d-yaf wemɛellem-nsen ɛawzen. A wen-d iniɣ tideț, ad ibeddel llebsa, a ten isɣim ɣer ṭṭabla iwakken a sen-yefk ad ččen.
Ma yewweḍ-ed di țnaṣfa n yiḍ neɣ akteṛ, amarezg-nsen ma yufa-ten-id mazal țṛaǧun-t !
Fehmet ayagi : lemmer yeẓra bab n wexxam lweqt i deg ara d-yas umakar, tili a t-iɛass ur t-ițțaǧa ara ad ikcem axxam-is.
Heggit iman-nwen ula d kunwi imi di lweqt i ɣef ur tebnim (tedmim) ara a d-yas Mmi-s n bunadem.
Buṭrus inṭeq yenna-yas : A Sidi, i nukkni iwumi d-tenniḍ lemtel-agi neɣ i lɣaci meṛṛa ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Anwa i d lewkil iḥeṛcen i ɣef yella lețkal, ara iwekkel bab n wexxam ɣef wayla-s, iwakken ad ifṛeq i yiqeddacen amur-nsen n yirden di lweqt ilaqen ?
Amarezg n wuqeddac agi ara d-yaf bab-is ibedd ɣer cceɣl-is !
A wen-d-iniɣ tideț, a t iwekkel ɣef wayen akk yesɛa.
Lameɛna aqeddac-nni ma yeqqaṛ deg wul-is : « amɛellem-iw iɛeṭṭel ur d yuɣal ara» ! Yebda iḥeqqeṛ iqeddacen ț-țqeddacin, yekkat-iten, iteț itess alamma yeskkeṛ.
A d-yas umɛellem-is deg wass i ɣef ur yebni ara, di lweqt ur yessin ara, a t-iɛaqeb s lmut akken țțuɛaqben wid iɛuṣan Ṛebbi.
Aqeddac yessnen lebɣi n bab-is yerna ur t-ixdim ara, ad yečč tiɣṛit tameqqrant,
ma d win ur nessin ara lebɣi n bab-is, ixdem ayen yuklalen tiɣṛit, ad yečč tiɣṛit tamecṭuḥt. Win iwumi nefka aṭas a s-nessuter aṭas, ma d win i ɣef nețkel aṭas a neṛǧu deg-s akteṛ.
Usiɣ-ed a d-awiɣ yiwet n tmes ɣer ddunit ! Acḥal ɣeṣbeɣ melmi ara tecɛel !
Yella yiwen n weɣḍas i yi-țṛaǧun... D leɛtab ameqqran yerna ɣeṣbeɣ melmi ara d-yas wass-nni !
Tɣilem d lehna i d-wwiɣ ɣer ddunit ? Xaṭi, d beṭṭu i d-wwiɣ !
Sya ɣer zdat ma llan xemsa deg yiwen wexxam, ad bḍun ; tlata a d-kkren ɣer sin, sin a d-kkren ɣer tlata.
Ababat a d-innaɣ d mmi-s, mmi-s a d-yekker ɣer baba-s ; tayemmaț aț-țennaɣ d yelli-s, yelli-s akk-d yemma-s ; tamɣaṛt aț-țennaɣ ț-țeslit-is, tislit akk-d temɣaṛt-is.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna daɣen i lɣaci : M'ara twalim asigna yekka-d si lɣeṛb, teqqaṛem atan a d-tewwet lehwa ; d ayen i gdeṛṛun.
M'ara d-iṣuḍ waḍu seg usammer teqqaṛem ad iḥmu lḥal ; d ayen i d-ideṛṛun daɣen.
Ay at sin wudmawen ! Imi tessnem aț-țɛeqlem lḥal n yigenni d lqaɛa, amek ur tezmirem ara aț-țɛeqlem zzman-agi ?
Acuɣeṛ ur tețmeyyizem ara s yiman-nwen ɣef wayen yellan d lḥeqq ?
M'ara k-yessiweḍ wexṣim-ik ɣer ccṛeɛ, eɛṛeḍ a ț-tefruḍ yid-es uqbel aț-țawḍem ɣer dinna, neɣ m'ulac a k-yawi ɣer lḥakem, lḥakem a k-yefk i uɛessas, aɛessas a k-iḍeggeṛ ɣer lḥebs.
A k-d-iniɣ : ur d-tețțeffɣeḍ ara syenna alamma txellṣeḍ aṣurdi aneggaru n ṭlaba-inek.
Di lweqt-nni, kra n yemdanen usan-d a s-ḥkun i Sidna Ɛisa ɣef kra n yergazen n tmurt n Jlili i genɣa Bilaṭus, d wamek issexleḍ dammen-nsen d idammen n iseflawen nsen.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Tɣilem belli imezdaɣ-agi n Jlili ițțuɛetben akka d imednuben akteṛ n wiyaḍ ?
Xaṭi, meɛna a wen-d-iniɣ : m'ur tbeddlem ara tikli aț-țemtem ula d kunwi.
Neɣ am tmenṭac-nni yergazen yemmuten mi d-yeɣli fell-asen ṣṣuṛ n Silwi, tɣilem d imednuben akteṛ n imezdaɣ nniḍen n temdint n Lquds ?
Xaṭi, meɛna nniɣ-awen : m'ur tbeddlem ara tikli aț-țemtem ula d kunwi.
Yewwi-yasen-d lemtel-agi : Yiwen wergaz yesɛa taneqleț teẓẓa deg yiger n tẓurin. Yusa-d iwakken a d-ikkes tibexsisin lameɛna ur yufi ara.
Yenna i uxeddam n yiger-nni : tlata n yiseggasen aya nekk țțaseɣ ed iwakken a d-kkseɣ lexṛif si tneqleț agi meɛna ur d-țțafeɣ ara, gzem-iț ihi ! Acuɣeṛ ara teṭṭef akal mbla nnfeɛ ?
Axeddam-nni yerra-yas : a Sidi, eǧǧ-iț aț-țernu aseggas-a ; aț-țneqceɣ, a s-rreɣ leɣbaṛ,
sya d asawen ma tefka-d lfakya eǧǧ-iț, m'ulac qeleɛ -iț.
Sidna Ɛisa yesselmad deg yiwen n lǧameɛ deg wass n westeɛfu.
Tella dinna yiwet n tmeṭṭut ihelken tmenṭac yiseggasen aya ; d yiwen uṛuḥani i ț-ikerfen ur tezmir ara aț-țesbedd lqedd-is.
Mi ț-iwala Sidna Ɛisa, iluɛa-ț yenna-yas : A tameṭṭut, teḥliḍ seg wekraf-im.
Issers ifassen-is fell-as , imiren kan tesbedd lqedd-is, teḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi.

Ccix-nni n lǧameɛ iɣaḍ-it lḥal imi i ț-isseḥla Sidna Ɛisa deg wass n westeɛfu, yenna i lɣaci : Llan sețța wussan i deg ilaq a nexdem ; aset-ed ihi deg ussan-nni iwakken a kkun-isseḥlu mačči deg wass n westeɛfu !
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Ay at sin wudmawen ! Anwa deg-wen ur d-nețserriḥ i wezger-ines neɣ i weɣyul-is iwakken a t-yawi a d-isew ɣas deg wass n westeɛfu ?
I tmeṭṭut-agi yellan si dderya n Ibṛahim, i gekref Cciṭan tmenṭac n yiseggasen aya, eɛni ur ilaq ara a s-nekkes akraf ɣas akka d ass n westeɛfu ?
Mi d-yenna imeslayen-agi, ixṣimen-is meṛṛa nneḥcamen ma d lɣaci feṛḥen s leɛǧayeb i gxeddem.
Yenna daɣen : ?er wacu i tețțemcabi tgeldit n Ṛebbi ? ?er wacu ara ț-metleɣ ?
Tețțemcabi ɣer uɛeqqa amecṭuḥ n zerriɛa n uxerḍel i geẓẓa yiwen wergaz di tebḥirt-is. Mi d-imɣi yuɣal d ttejṛa, ifṛax n igenni bnan leɛcuc deg ifurkawen-is.
Yenna daɣen : ?er wacu i zemreɣ ad metleɣ tageldit n Ṛebbi ?
Tețțemcabi ɣer ciṭṭuḥ yiɣes n temtunt i d-teddem tmeṭṭut, tger-it di tlata lkilat n uwren dɣa teǧǧa-t armi yuli meṛṛa.
Deg webrid-is ɣer temdint n Lquds, Sidna Ɛisa ițɛedday ɣef temdinin ț-țudrin, isselmad.
Isteqsa-t yiwen yenna-yas : A Sidi, drus n yemdanen ara yețțuselken ?
Yenna-yasen : Qellbet amek ara tkecmem si tewwurt iḍeyqen ; a wen-d-iniɣ : aṭas ara yebɣun ad kecmen lameɛna ur țțizmiren ara.

M'ara d-yekker bab n wexxam ad isekkeṛ tawwurt, wid i d-yufa lḥal di beṛṛa a d-bdun asqeṛbeb ad qqaṛen : « A Sidi ! A Sidi ! Ldi-yaɣ tawwurt» ! Nețța a wen-d-yerr : ur kkun-ssineɣ ur ẓriɣ ansi i d-tekkam !?
Kunwi ad as-tinim : « anaɣ nečča neswa yid-ek, teslemdeḍ deg yizenqan nneɣ ! »
Nețța a wen-d-yerr : Nniɣ-awen ur kkun-ssineɣ ara, beɛdet akkin fell-i a kunwi ixeddmen cceṛ !
Dinna ara yilin yimeṭṭawen d nndama tameqqrant m'ara twalim Ibṛahim, Isḥaq, Yeɛqub akk-d lenbiya di tgelda n yigenwan, ma d kunwi aț-țeqqimem di beṛṛa.
A d-asen si cceṛq d lɣeṛb, seg umalu d usammer, ad ṭṭfen imukan di tmeɣṛa n tgelda n igenwan.
Imiren ad ilin ineggura ara yuɣalen d imezwura, am akken daɣen ara yilin imezwura ara yuɣalen d ineggura.
Di teswiɛt-nni, kra n ifariziyen usan-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Ṛuḥ tixxeṛ syagi, atan Hiṛudus ițqellib a k-ineɣ.
Yenna-yasen : Ṛuḥet init-as i wuccen-agi : ass-a d uzekka ad ssufɣeɣ leǧnun, ad sseḥluɣ imuḍan , ass wis tlata ad fakeɣ cceɣl-iw.
Lameɛna ilaq ad kemmleɣ tikli-inu ass-a, azekka d sellazekka, axaṭer ur s-ilaq ara i nnbi ad immet beṛṛa n temdint n Lquds.

A tamdint n Lquds ! A tamdint n Lquds ineqqen lenbiya, iṛeǧǧmen wid i m-d-ițwaceggɛen s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi ! Acḥal d abrid i ɛerḍeɣ a d-jemɛeɣ arraw-im am tyaziṭ i d-ijemɛen ifṛax-is seddaw wafriwen-is, lameɛna ur tebɣim ara.
Atan ihi, axxam-nwen ad ixlu yerna nniɣ-awen, ur iyi-tẓerrem ara alamma d asmi ara tinim : Ad ițțubarek win i d-yusan s yisem n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Yiwen wass yellan d ass n westeɛfu, Sidna Ɛisa illa yețwaɛreḍ ɣer wexxam n yiwen seg yimeqqranen n yifariziyen iwakken ad yefteṛ. Wid yellan dinna țɛassan-t d acu ara yexdem.
Yella dinna yiwen wergaz yesɛan lehlak n ubezzug.
Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq ɣer lɛulama n ccariɛa d yifariziyen yenna-yasen : D acu twalam ? D leḥlal win ara isseḥlun deg wass n westeɛfu neɣ ala ?
Imi yiwen deg-sen ur d-yenṭiq, Sidna Ɛisa iqeṛṛeb ɣer umuḍin-nni, yesseḥla-t, iserreḥ-as ad iṛuḥ.
Dɣa yenna i wiyaḍ : Anwa deg-wen ma yeɣli-yas mmi-s neɣ wezger-ines ɣer lbir, ur t-id-ițekkes ara ɣas ma d ass n westeɛfu ?
Yiwen ur izmir a s-d-yerr awal.
Mi gwala wid yețwaɛerḍen bdan țextiṛin imukan imezwura, Sidna Ɛisa yewwi-yasen-d lemtel-agi yenna yasen :
M'ara k-id-yeɛreḍ yiwen ɣer tmeɣṛa, ɣurek ur țțaṭṭaf ara amkan amezwaru ! Axaṭer yezmer ad yili yiwen ger inebgawen yesɛan leqdeṛ akteṛ-ik ,
a d-yas win i kkun-iɛerḍen i sin a k-yini : « eǧǧ-as amkan-nni i wagi ! » Imiren aț-țenneḥcameḍ, aț-țṛuḥeḍ aț-țeṭṭfeḍ amkan aneggaru.
Lameɛna m'ara tețwaɛeṛḍeḍ, ṭṭef amkan aneggaru iwakken m'ara d-yas win i k-id-iɛerḍen, a k-yini : « ay aḥbib ɛeddi-d ɣer zdat ! » Imiren aț-țesɛuḍ leqdeṛ zdat inebgawen meṛṛa.
Axaṭer kra n win yessalayen iman-is a t-id-yessers Ṛebbi , ma d win yesrusuyen iman-is a t-yerfed.

Yenna daɣen i win i t-id iɛeṛḍen : M'ara tebɣuḍ aț-țseččeḍ, ur d-ɛeṛṛeḍ ara imdukkal-ik neɣ atmaten ik, ur d-ɛeṛṛeḍ ara imawlan-ik neɣ lǧiran-ik imeṛkantiyen ; m'ulac a k ɛerḍen ula d nutni iwakken a k-d-rren lxiṛ-ik.
Lameɛna m'ara txedmeḍ tameɣṛa, ɛṛeḍ-ed igellilen, ineɛyuba, iquḍaren d yiderɣalen.
Ili-k di lfeṛḥ imi ur zmiren ara a k-d-rren lxiṛ-ik, axaṭer lxiṛ-ik a k-id-yuɣal asm'ara d-ḥyun wid yellan d iḥeqqiyen ɣer Ṛebbi.
Mi gesla i imeslayen-agi, yiwen seg inebgawen inṭeq-ed yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : Amasseɛd n win ara yeččen tiremt di tgelda n yigenwan!
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yiwen wergaz ixdem imensi, iɛreḍ-ed aṭas lɣaci.
Lweqt n imensi, iceggeɛ aqeddac-is iwakken ad yini i inebgawen : aset-ed ! Kullec iwjed !
Akken ma llan ufan-d sebba. Amezwaru yenna-yas : « aql-i uɣeɣ iger, ilaq ad ṛuḥeɣ a t-id-ẓreɣ , di leɛnaya-k semmeḥ-iyi ».
Wayeḍ yenna-yas : « aql-i uɣeɣ-d xemsa n tyugiwin n yezgaren bɣiɣ ad ṛuḥeɣ a tent-ɛerḍeɣ, di leɛnaya-k semmeḥ iyi ».
Wayeḍ daɣen yenna-yas : « tura kan i zewǧeɣ, ulamek ara d aseɣ ».

Mi d-yuɣal uqeddac ɣer umɛellem-is, yeḥka-yas ayen akk i s-d-nnan. Bab n wexxam yerfa, yenna i uqeddac-is : « azzel, ṛuḥ ɣer yiberdan d yizenqan n temdint, tɛeṛḍeḍ-ed iẓawaliyen, ineɛyuba, iderɣalen d iquḍaren ».
Mi d-yuɣal uqeddac-nni yenna-yas : a Sidi, ayen i yi-d-tenniḍ xedmeɣ-t yerna mazal llan imukan.
Amɛellem yenna i uqeddac is : « effeɣ ɣer iberdan n tudrin d lexlawi ; wid akk ara tafeḍ, ḥṛeṣ-iten a d asen iwakken ad iččaṛ wexxam-iw. »
Atan nniɣ-awen : ula d yiwen seg wid-nni yețwaɛerḍen d imezwura ur iɛerreḍ imensi-inu.
Aṭas n lɣaci i geddan d Sidna Ɛisa. Yezzi ɣuṛ-sen yenna-yasen :
Kra n win ara d-yasen ɣuṛ-i, ma iḥemmel baba-s d yemma-s neɣ tameṭṭut-is d warraw-is neɣ ayetma-s d yessetma-s neɣ iḥemmel iman-is akteṛ-iw, ur izmir ara ad yili d anelmad-iw.
Kra n win ur neqbil ara ad yeɛteb ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw yerna ur iyi-d-itbiɛ ara, ur izmir ara ad yili d anelmad-iw.
